content: Zaaj nuav yog has txug Yexus Khetos cov yawmkoob tej npe. Yexus yog Daviv Tub hab Daviv yog Anplahaas xeebntxwv.
Txij thaus Anplahaas lug txug thaus Vaajntxwv Daviv, Yexus cov yawmkoob muaj le nuav: Anplahaas yog Ixaj txiv, Ixaj yog Yakhauj txiv, Yakhauj yog Yudas hab nwg cov kwvtij txiv,
Yudas yog Peles hab Zelas txiv (obtug nam yog Tamaj), Pelej yog Heloos txiv, Heloos yog Laas txiv, Laas yog Anpinadas txiv, Anpinadas yog Nasoos txiv.
Nasoos yog Xalemoos txiv,
Xalemoos yog Npau-am txiv, (Npau-am nam yog Lahaj), Npau-am yog Aunpes txiv, (Aunpes nam yog Luv), Aunpes yog Yexais txiv,

Yexais yog Vaajntxwv Daviv txiv. Txij thaus Daviv lug txug rua thaus cov Yixalayees raug nteg moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos, Yexus cov yawmkoob muaj le nuav: Daviv yog Xalumoos txiv, (Xalumoos nam yog Uliyas tug quaspuj),
Xalumoos yog Lehaunpau-aas txiv, Lehaunpau-aas yog Anpiyas txiv, Anpiyas yog Axas txiv,
Axas yog Yehausafas txiv, Yehausafas yog Yehaulaas txiv, Yehaulaas yog Uxiyas txiv,
Uxiyas yog Yauthaas txiv, Yauthaas yog Ahas txiv, Ahas yog Hexekiyas txiv, Hexekiyas yog Manaxes txiv, Manaxes yog Amoos txiv,
Amoos yog Yauxiyas txiv,
Yauxiyas yog Yehauyakhees hab nwg cov kwvtij txiv.
Txij thaus cov Yixalayees raug nteg moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lug txug rua thaus yug Yexus, Yexus cov yawmkoob muaj le nuav: Yehauyakhees yog Se-atiyees txiv, Se-atiyees yog Xelunpanpees txiv,
Xelunpanpees yog Anpi-us txiv, Anpi-us yog Eli-akees txiv, Eli-akees yog Axaus txiv,
Axaus yog Xadaus txiv, Xadaus yog Akhis txiv, Akhis yog Eli-us txiv,
Eli-us yog Ele-axas txiv, Ele-axas yog Mathaas txiv, Mathaas yog Yakhauj txiv,
Yakhauj yog Yauxej txiv. Malis kws yog Yexus nam yog Yauxej tug quaspuj. Yexus yog tug kws suavdlawg hu ua tug Cawmseej.

Yog le ntawd, txij thaus Anplahaas lug txug Daviv, muaj kaum plaub tam, txij thaus Daviv lug txug thaus cov Yixalayees raug nteg moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos muaj kaum plaub tam, hab txij thaus cov Yixalayees raug nteg moog rua tebchaws Npanpiloos lug txug thaus yug tug Mexiyas muaj kaum plaub tam.

Zaaj kws yuav has nuav yog has txug zaaj kws Yexus lug yug rua huv lub nplajteb nuav. Yauxej tub xub qhab Malis kws yog Yexus nam ca lawm. Tabsis thaus obtug tseem tsi tau sis yuav, Malis paub has tas Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv ua rua nwg xeeb tub lawm.
Yauxej tug kws qhab Malis yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, nwg tsi xaav ca Malis poob ntsejmuag, nwg txawm xaav has tas, nwg yuav tso Malis tuabywv tseg.

Thaus Yauxej tseem xaav txug zaaj ntawd, Yauxej txawm ua npau suav pum tug Tswv ib tug timtswv lug has rua nwg tas, “Yauxej kws yog Daviv tug xeebntxwv, koj tsi xob nyuaj sab. Koj ca le moog yuav Malis lug ua koj quaspuj. Rua qhov tub yog Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv ua rua Malis xeeb tub.
Malis yuav yug ib tug mivtub, koj yuavtsum tis tug mivtub ntawd npe hu ua Yexus, rua qhov nwg yog tug kws yuav lug cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg kuas puab dlim puab lub txim.”
Tej nuav muaj lawv le tej lug kws tug Tswv tau qha rua tug cev Vaajtswv lug lawm has tas,
“Ib tug nkaujxwb yuav xeeb tub hab yuav yug ib tug mivtub hab suavdlawg yuav hu nwg lub npe has tas Emanu-ees” (Lub npe nuav txhais has tas, “Vaajtswv nrug peb nyob”).
Thaus Yauxej tsim dlheev lug, nwg txawm moog coj Malis lug ua nwg quaspuj lawv le tug Tswv tug timtswv tau has rua nwg lawm.
Tabsis Yauxej yeej tsi nrug Malis pw moog txug thaus kws Malis yug tug mivtub ntawd. Thaus yug tau lawm, Yauxej tis tug mivtub ntawd npe hu ua Yexus.

Yexus yug huv lub nroog Npelehees kws nyob huv cov Yudais lub tebchaws. Lub sijhawm ntawd Helauj ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws. Tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev muaj cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib nubqub ob peb leeg tuaj saab nubtuaj tuaj txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Puab nug has tas, “Tug mivtub kws yuav ua cov Yudais tug vaajntxwv nwg yug rua qhov twg? Peb pum nwg lub nubqub kws qha has tas, nwg yug lug lawm tawm tim saab nubtuaj tuaj, peb txhaj tuaj pehawm nwg.”
Thaus Vaajntxwv Helauj nov le ntawd, nwg hab tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nyuaj sab heev.
Helauj txawm hu cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj kevcai tuaj ua ke, Helauj nug puab has tas, “Tug Mexiyas yuav yug rua qhov twg?”
Puab teb has tas, “Nwg yuav yug huv lub nroog Npelehees kws nyob huv cov Yudais lub tebchaws. Tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug sau le nuav tseg has tas,

‘Lub nroog Npelehees kws nyob huv xeev Yudas, Koj tsi yog lub nroog kws miv dlua tej nroog huv tebchaws Yudas; rua qhov yuav muaj ib tug thawjcoj lug yug huv koj. Nwg yuav coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.’ ”
Ces Helauj txawm hu cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib nubqub lug cuag nwg tsi pub leejtwg paub. Helauj kuas puab qha nwg saib lub sijhawm twg puab pum lub nubqub ntawd tawm tuaj.

Tom qaab ntawd Helauj kuas puab moog nraag lub nroog Npelehees hab has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le moog nrhav tug mivtub ntawd; yog mej moog nrhav tau nwg lawm, mej rov qaab lug qha rua kuv, kuv yuav moog pehawm nwg hab.”

Thaus Helauj has le ntawd taag, ces puab txawm tawm moog lawm. Thaus puab taabtom taug kev moog puab pum lub nubqub kws puab xub pum tim saab nubtuaj. Lub nubqub ntawd coj puab kev moog hab lub nubqub ntawd moog nreg ncaaj ntawm qhov chaw kws tug mivtub ntawd nyob lawm sau.
Thaus Puab pum lub nubqub ntawd, puab zoo sab kawg le.

Thaus puab moog rua huv tsev, puab pum tug mivtub hab Malis kws yog tug mivtub ntawd nam, puab txhus caug ndlua pehawm tug mivtub. Puab thau puab tej kub, tej tshuaj tsw qaab, hab tej roj tsw qaab huv puab cov naab lug pub rua tug mivtub.
Mo ntawd puab ua npau suav pum Vaajtswv lug has rua puab tas, kuas puab moog lwm txujkev moog tsev, tsi xob rov moog qha rua Helauj.

Thaus cov tuabneeg txawj saib nubqub rov moog lawm, Yauxej ua npau suav pum tug Tswv ib tug timtswv lug has rua Yauxej has tas, “Koj ca le sawv hab coj tug mivtub hab nwg nam tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab nyob nraag moog txug thaus kws kuv kuas mej moog rua lwm qhov. Rua qhov Vaajntxwv Helauj taabtom nrhav tug mivtub nuav tua povtseg.”
Yauxej txawm sawv tseeg coj tug mivtub hab Malis maub tsiv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv.
Yauxej puab nyob nraag moog txug thaus Helauj tuag. Tej nuav muaj kuas tav lawv le tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau has tseg lawm has tas, “Kuv yuav hu kuv tug Tub tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug.”

Thaus Helauj paub has tas, cov tub txawg kws txawj saib nubqub dlaag nwg lawm, nwg chim heev. Nwg txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog rua huv lub nroog Npelehees hab tej zej zog kws nyob ibncig lub nroog ntawd, muab cov mivnyuas tub kws muaj noobnyoog ob xyoos rov huv tua povtseg huv tuabsi. Helauj ua le nuav kuas hum lub sijhawm kws cov tuabneeg txawj saib nubqub pum lub nubqub ntawd.
Tej nuav muaj kuas tav lawv le Yelemis kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug qha tseg has tas,

“Suavdlawg yuav nov suab quaj suab nyav huv lub nroog Lamas, yog lub suab quaj kws tu sab kawg le. Laxees yuav quaj ntsuag rua nwg tej mivnyuas; tsi muaj leejtwg yuav nplig tau nwg sab, rua qhov nwg cov mivnyuas tuag taag lawm.”
Tom qaab kws Helauj tuag lawm, Yauxej tseem nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, Yauxej txawm ua npau suav pum tug Tswv ib tug timtswv lug has rua Yauxej has tas,
“Koj ca le sawv tseeg coj tug mivtub hab nwg nam rov qaab moog rua peg tebchaws Yixalayees, rua qhov tug kws yuav tua tug mivtub nuav tub tuag lawm.”
Yauxej txawm sawv tseeg coj tug mivtub hab Malis rov qaab moog rua peg tebchaws Yixalayees.

Tabsis thaus Yauxej nov has tas, Akhilaus ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas hloov nwg txiv Helauj chaw lawm. Yauxej ntshai, Yauxej tsi kaam moog nyob qhov ntawd. Yauxej rov qaab ua npau suav pum Vaajtswv lug qha rua nwg, ces nwg txawm moog rua peg xeev Kalilais lawm.

Nwg moog nyob huv ib lub nroog hu ua Naxales. Yauxej ua le nuav kuas muaj tav lawv le tej lug kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg txug tug mivtub ntawd has tas, “Suavdlawg yuav hu nwg has tas nwg yog tuabneeg Naxales.”
Thaus ntawd Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej, nwg tawm moog qhuab qha tom roob mojsaab qhua huv cov Yudais lub tebchaws.
Yauhaas has tas, “Mej ca le tso plhuav mej tej kev txhum tseg, rua qhov Ntuj Ceebtsheej tub lug ze lawm!”

Yauhaas yog tug kws Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tub qha tseg lawm has tas: “Muaj ib tug has nrov nrov tom roob mojsaab qhua has tas, ‘Ca le khu kev tog tug Tswv; khu kev kuas ncaaj, nwg yuav lug!’ ”
Yauhaas tej rig tsho yog muab plaub ntxhuav ua; nwg sa hlaab tawv, nwg noj kooj hab zib ntaab.
Muaj tuabneeg coob coob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab thoob plawg cov Yudais lub tebchaws, hab huv tej zog kws nyob ob caag ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees tuaj cuag Yauhaas.
Cov tuabneeg nyag leeg nyag lub txim, Yauhaas muab puab ua kevcai raus dlej huv tug dlej Yauladees.

Thaus Yauhaas pum cov Falixais hab cov Xadukais coob leej tuaj thov Yauhaas, kuas Yauhaas muab puab ua kevcai raus dlej, Yauhaas has rua puab tas, “Cov nam naab, leejtwg qha rua mej has tas, mej yuav tsiv dlim Vaajtswv txujkev txav txim kws yuav muaj lug sai sai nuav?
Mej yuavtsum ua mej lub neej kuas tsimnyog qhov kws mej tub tso mej tej kev txhum tseg lawm.

Mej tsi xob khaav has tas mej yog Anplahaas cov xeebntxwv, ces mej txawm yuav dlim tsi raug txim. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, txawm yog Vaajtswv yuav muab tej pobzeb lug ua Anplahaas cov xeebntxwv los nwg yeej ua tau!
Nwgnuav tub npaaj tau raab taus lawm, yuav ntuv tej ntoo, txhua tsob ntoo kws tsi txi cov txiv zoo, yuav muab ntuv pov rua huv cub suavtawg huv tuabsi.

Qhov kws kuv muab mej ua kevcai raus rua huv dlej qha has tas mej tub tso mej tej kev txhum tseg lawm, tabsis tug kws yuav lawv kuv qaab lug, nwg yuav muab mej raus lug ntawm Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv hab ntawm suavtawg. Tug ntawd muaj fwjchim luj dlua kuv; kuv tub tsi tsimnyog nqaa nwg nkawm khau khab.

Nwg tuav rawv ib raab ntxuam, nwg yuav ntxuaj nwg pawg nplej kuas cov npluag yaa tawm huv tuabsi! Nwg yuav muab cov nplej zoo ntim rua huv nwg lub txhaab, tabsis nwg yuav muab cov npluag pov rua huv cub suavtawg kws cig tsi paub tuag.”
Thaus ntawd Yexus tuaj peg Kalilais tuaj cuag Yauhaas ntawm tug dlej Yauladees, kuas Yauhaas muab Yexus ua kevcai raus dlej.
Tabsis Yauhaas tsi kaam, Yauhaas has rua Yexus has tas, “Tsimnyog koj muab kuv ua kevcai raus dlej, ua caag koj tsua tuaj cuag kuv?”

Yexus teb Yauhaas has tas, “Koj ca le muab kuv ua kevcai raus dlej, rua qhov tub tsimnyog peb ua txhua yaam lawv le Vaajtswv pum zoo kuas peb ua.” Yog le ntawd, Yauhaas txhaj muab Yexus ua kevcai raus dlej.
Thaus Yexus ua kevcai raus dlej taag, nwg tawm huv haav dlej lug. Taamsim ntawd rooj ntug txawm qheb hlo, nwg pum Vaajtswv tug Ntsujplig zoo le tug nquab lug tsaws sau nwg taubhau.
Muaj ib lub suab has sau ntuj tuaj has tas, “Tug nuav yog kuv tug Tub kws kuv hlub, kuv txaus sab rua nwg.”
Tom qaab ntawd Vaaj Ntsujplig coj Yexus moog rua tom roob mojsaab qhua kuas Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog tau sim Yexus sab.
Yexus nyob tod tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo, nwg tsi tau noj ib yaam dlaabtsi le. Thaus dlhau lub sijhawm ntawd lawm nwg tshaib plaab heev.
Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog lug has rua Yexus has tas, “Yog koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub tag, koj ca le has kuas lub pobzeb nuav txa ua mov.”
Tabsis Yexus teb has tas, “Vaajtswv txujlug sau tseg has tas, ‘Tsi yog mov xwb txhaj cawm tau tuabneeg txujsa, tabsis yog Vaajtswv tej lug txhua lu txhaj cawm tau.’ ”
Tom qaab ntawd, dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txawm coj Yexus moog rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kws yog lub Nroog Dlawbhuv. Nwg coj Yexus moog rua sau lub Tuamtsev qhov chaw kws sab tshaaj plawg.

Nwg has rua Yexus has tas, “Yog koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub tag, koj ca le dlha rua huv aav, rua qhov tub muaj lug sau tseg rua huv Vaajtswv txujlug has tas: ‘Vaajtswv yuav kuas nwg cov timtswv tsomkwm koj; puab ob txhais teg yuav fwj koj, hab yuav tsi pub koj ob txhais kutaw tsoo pobzeb le.’ ”
Yexus teb dlaab Ntxwgnyoog has tas, “Vaajtswv txujlug has tas, ‘Koj tsi xob sim tug Tswv kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv sab.’ ”
Tom qaab ntawd dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txawm coj Yexus moog rua sau ib lub roob sab sab hab ua rua Yexus pum taagnrho tej tebchaws huv qaab ntuj nuav hab pum tej kev vaammeej huv tej tebchaws ntawd.
Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog has rua Yexus has tas, “Yog koj txhus caug pe kuv, kuv yuav muab txhua yaam nuav rua koj.”
Yexus has rua dlaab Ntxwgnyoog has tas, “Ntxwgnyoog, koj ca le tsiv moog! Vaajtswv txujlug has tas, ‘Mej yuavtsum pehawm tug Tswv kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tuab leeg hab ua nwg teg num xwb!’ ”
Ces dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txawm ncaim Yexus lawm. Tom qaab ntawd muaj ib cov timtswv ceebtsheej lug tu Yexus.
Thaus Yexus nov has tas, luas nteg Yauhaas coj moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj lawm, ces Yexus txawm moog rua peg Kalilais.
Yexus tsi moog nyob huv lub nroog Naxales, tabsis nwg moog nyob huv lub nroog Kapena-us, ntawm ntug dlej havtxwv Kalilais kws yog xeem Xenpuloos hab xeem Nathalis cheebtsaam aav.
Tej nuav muaj kuas tav lawv le Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg has tas,
“Xeem Xenpuloos cheebtsaam aav hab xeem Nathalis cheebtsaam aav kws nyob saab ntug dlej Yauladees tim u, ntawm txujkev kws moog rua havtxwv huv lub xeev Kalilais kws lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg nyob!
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob qhov tsaus ntuj yuav pum kev kaaj nrig. Hab txujkev kaaj ntawd yuav ci rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv qhov tsaus ntuj kws yog txujkev tuag.”
Txij thaus ntawd lug Yexus txawm pib qha rua suavdlawg has tas: “Mej ca le tso mej tej kev txhum tseg, rua qhov Ntuj Ceebtsheej tub lug ze lawm!”
Thaus Yexus taabtom taug ntug dlej Havtxwv Kalilais, nwg pum ob kwvtij kws yog, Ximoos (kws hu ua Petus) hab nwg tug kwv Aadales, obtug taabtom muab vaag ntaus ntseg huv havtxwv.
Yexus has rua obtug tas, “Meb ca le nrug kuv moog, kuv yuav qha kuas meb paub moog nrhav tuabneeg.”.
Taamsim ntawd obtug txawm tso plhuav obtug ob lub vaag tseg hab nrug Yexus moog.

Yexus moog tom ntej mivntsiv, Yexus pum dlua ob kwvtij kws yog Yakaunpaus hab Yauhaas, obtug yog Xenpedais tub. Obtug taabtom nrug obtug txiv Xenpedais ntxiv vaag huv nkoj, Yexus txawm hu obtug nrug Yexus moog.
Taamsim ntawd obtug txawm tso lub nkoj hab obtug txiv tseg, hab obtug nrug Yexus moog.

Yexus moog thoob plawg huv lub xeev Kalilais, nwg qhuab qha huv tej tsev saablaaj, hab qha Txujmoo Zoo kws has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws. Hab Yexus khu cov tuabneeg muaj mob tsi has cov tuabneeg mob yaam mob twg los nwg khu zoo huv tuabsi.

Yexus lub moo rov nchaa moog thoob plawg tebchaws Xilias, ces suavdlawg txawm coj tej tuabneeg muaj mob, tsi has tug mob yaam mob twg los tuaj cuag Yexus, tej tuabneeg raug dlaab, tej tuabneeg qaug dlaabpeg, hab tej tuabneeg tuag teg tuag taw los Yexus khu txhua tug zoo huv tuabsi.

Muaj tuabneeg coob coob huv xeev Kalilais, huv lub nroog Dekapaulis, huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, huv cov Yudais lub tebchaws hab huv lub tebchaws kws nyob saab ntug dlej Yauladees tim u tuaj nrug Yexus moog.
Thaus Yexus pum cov tuabneeg coob coob le ntawd, Yexus txawm moog rua peg roob, thaus Yexus nyob quastsawg lawm. Yexus cov thwjtim txawm lug cuag Yexus.
Yexus txawm pib qha puab:
“Cov kws paub has tas puab ua tsi tau puab lub neej lawv le Vaajtswv lub sab nyam; cov ntawd tau koob moov, rua qhov Ntuj Ceebtsheej yog puab le!
“Cov kws paub nyuaj sab rua puab tej kev txhum, cov ntawd tau koob moov, rua qhov Vaajtswv yuav nplig puab sab!
Cov kws txu fwjchim, cov ntawd tau koob moov, puab yuav tau txais tej kws Vaajtswv coglug tseg has tas Vaajtswv yuav muab rua puab.
Cov kws xaav ua lawv le Vaajtswv lub sab nyam, cov ntawd tau koob moov, Vaajtswv yuav muab rua puab kuas txaus nkaus le puab lub sab xaav.
Cov kws muaj lub sab hlub lwm tug, cov ntawd tau koob moov, Vaajtswv yuav hlub puab!
Cov kws muaj lub sab ncaaj nceeg, cov ntawd tau koob moov, puab yuav pum Vaajtswv!
Cov kws ua rua tuabneeg nyob sis humxeeb, cov ntawd tau koob moov, Vaajtswv yuav hu puab has tas, puab yog Vaajtswv cov mivnyuas!
Cov kws raug luas tsimtxom vim puab ua lawv le Vaajtswv lub sab nyam, cov ntawd tau koob moov, Ntuj Ceebtsheej yog puab tug.
“Thaus luas thuam mej hab tsimtxom mej, vim mej yog kuv cov thwjtim, mej tau koob moov.
Mej ca le zoo sab rua qhov Vaajtswv tub npaaj nqe zug ntau kawg le ca rua sau ntuj ceebtsheej rua mej lawm. Thaus u luas tub tsimtxom cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug le nuav lawm hab.”

“Mej yog cov ntsev kws laag tuabneeg nplajteb. Yog cov ntsev tsuag lawm, yuav ua le caag ua kuas rov qaab ntsev tau? Cov ntsev ntawd tsi muaj nqes dlaabtsi, tsuas muaj yuav muab povtseg hab tuabneeg yuav muab tsuj xwb.
“Mej yog lub teeb kws ci rua tuabneeg nplajteb pum kev. Lub nroog kws nyob sau roob, yeej tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi yuav thaiv tau lub nroog ntawd.
Tsi muaj leejtwg taws teeb hab muab phab khwb rua; tabsis tsuas muaj yuav muab txawb rua qhov chaw sab, kuas txhua tug kws nyob huv lub tsev pum kev.
Ib yaam le ntawd, mej yuavtsum ci rua suavdlawg pum tej num zoo kws mej ua, puab txhaj yuav qhuas mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej.”

“Mej tsi xob xaav has tas yog kuv lug rhuav Mauxes txuj Kevcai hab tej lug kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg lawm. Tsi yog kuv lug rhuav tej lug ntawd, tabsis yog kuv lug ua kuas tej lug ntawd tav.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb tseem muaj nyob, ces txuj Kevcai ntawd yuav tsi muaj ib lus poob moog txug thaus txhua yaam  tav lawm.

Yog leejtwg tsi kaam ua lawv le nqai lug kws miv dlua huv txuj Kevcai nuav hab nwg tseem qha lwm tug kuas tsi xob ua lawv le ntawd, ces Vaajtswv yuav suav has tas tug ntawd yog tug kws yau dlua ndlais kws nyob sau Ntuj Ceebtsheej. Tabsis tug kws ua lawv le txuj Kevcai ntawd hab qha rua lwm tug kuas ua lawv le ntawd, ces tug ntawd yuav yog tug luj kws nyob sau Ntuj Ceebtsheej.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog mej tsi ua ncaaj dlua cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai hab cov Falixais, ces mej yuav tsi tau moog nyob sau Ntuj Ceebtsheej.
“Mej tub nov tej lug kws luas qha rua cov tuabneeg thaus u lawm has tas, ‘Tsi xob tua tuabneeg; tug kws tua tuabneeg, tug ntawd yuav raug txim.’

Tabsis nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej le nuav: yog leejtwg chim  rua nwg tug kwvtij, tug ntawd yuav raug txim, hab tug kws has rua nwg tug kwvtij has tas, ‘Tuabneeg ruag!’ Ces luas yeej yuav coj tug ntawd moog rua cov numtswv txav txim; hab tug kws hu nwg ib tug kwvtij has tas, ‘Tuabneeg vwm!’, ces tug ntawd lub txim txaus nwg poob moog rua huv ntuj tawg lawm.
Yog le ntawd, thaus koj taabtom muab khoom rua sau lub thaaj yuav fij rua Vaajtswv, hab koj ncu has tas koj tau ua txhum rua koj ib tug kwvtij lawm,
ces koj ca le tso plhuav tej khoom fij rua ntawm hauv ntej lub thaaj, koj ca le rov qaab moog has kuas meb sis hum tsaiv, koj maam le rov qaab tuaj muab koj tej khoom fij rua Vaajtswv.

“Yog leejtwg xyuam phaaj kom koj rua huv tsev tu plaub hab yuav coj koj moog has plaub, ua ntej kws tsi tau moog has plaub, koj ca le thov nwg kuas meb rov sis hum, nyob tsaam thaus meb moog txug huv lub tsev tu plaub ntug lawm, nwg yuav muab koj rua tug txav txim, ces tug txav txim yuav muab koj cob rua tug ceevxwm, hab tug ceevxwm yuav coj koj moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.
Kuv qha tseeb rua koj has tas, koj yuav tawm tsi tau huv qhov chaw ntawd moog txug thaus kws koj them nqe taag.
“Mej tub nov tej lug kws luas qha has tas, ‘Tsi xob ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg.’

Tabsis nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog leejtwg saib ib tug quaspuj hab xaav ntxag tug quaspuj ntawd, qhov kws nwg saib le ntawd kuj txhum ib yaam le nwg tub tau ntxag tug quaspuj ntawd lawm ntaag.
Yog koj saab qhovmuag xis ua rua koj ua txhum, koj ca le muab saab qhovmuag ntawd kaus povtseg! Koj muaj ib saab qhovmuag xwb zoo dlua le muab taagnrho koj lub cev pov rua huv ntuj tawg.
Yog koj saab teg xis ua rua koj ua txhum, ces koj ca le muab saab teg ntawd txav povtseg! Koj tshuav ib saab teg xwb, zoo dlua le muab taagnrho koj lub cev pov rua huv ntuj tawg.
“Muaj dlua ib zaaj kws luas qha has tas, ‘Yog leejtwg yuav nrauj nwg tug quaspuj, mas nwg yuavtsum ua ntawv nas teg sis nrauj rua nwg tug quaspuj.’

Tabsis nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej has tas: yog leejtwg tug quaspuj tsi tau ntxag hluas nraug, nwg ca le muab nrauj lawm, kuj yog nwg ua rua tug quaspuj ua txhum kev nkauj kev nraug, hab yog leejtwg moog yuav tug quaspuj ntawd, kuj ib yaam le tug ntawd ntxag luas quaspuj.
“Hab mej tub nov tej lug kws luas qha rua cov tuabneeg thaus u lawm has tas, ‘Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le mej tau coglug tseg rua tug Tswv lawm, tsi xob rhuav tej lug cog tseg ntawd.’
Tabsis nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej has tas, thaus mej coglug tseg, mej tsi xob twv ntuj twv teb. Tsi xob twv lub ntuj, rua qhov lub ntuj yog Vaajtswv lub zwmtxwv;
tsi xob twv lub nplajteb, rua qhov lub nplajteb yog Vaajtswv qhov chaw tag taw; tsi xob twv txug lub nroog Yeluxalees, rua qhov lub nroog Yeluxalees yog tug Vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj lub.
Tsi xob twv rua mej lub taubhau, rua qhov mej ua tsi tau kuas mej ib txuj plaubhau dlawb lossis ib txuj dlub.
Qhov kws yog mej ca le has tas ‘Yog,’ qhov kws tsi yog, mej ca le has tas, ‘Tsi yog.’ Yog mej has tshaaj ob lu lug ntawd, ces tej lug ntawd yog lug ntawm dlaab Ntxwgnyoog lug xwb.
“Mej tub nov tej lug kws qha has tas, ‘Qhovmuag pauj qhovmuag, nav pauj nav.’
Tabsis nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej has tas: Mej tsi xob ua pauj. Yog leejtwg ntaus mej saab plhu xis, mej ca le tig saab txhumphem rua nwg ntaus hab.
Yog leejtwg kom mej rua huv tsev tu plaub txeeb yuav mej lub tsho kws naav tuaj saab huv, ces mej ca le hle mej lub tsho kws naav tuaj saab nrau rua luas hab.
Yog leejtwg yuam mej kuas ris nwg lub nraa moog ib kilumev, ces mej ca le ris moog ob kilumev.
Yog leejtwg tuaj thov yuav mej ib yaam dlaabtsi, mej ca le muab rua nwg; yog leejtwg qev mej ib yaam dlaabtsi, mej ca le qev rua nwg.
“Mej tub nov tej lug kws has tas, ‘Yuavtsum hlub mej cov kwvtij hab ntxub mej cov yeebncuab.’
Tabsis nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej has tas: Hlub mej cov yeebncuab hab thov Vaajtswv paab rua cov kws tsimtxom mej,

Yog mej ua le nuav, mej txhaj yog leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj cov mivnyuas. Rua qhov Vaajtswv ua nwg lub nub ci rua cov tuabneeg ua phem hab cov tuabneeg ua zoo, hab tso naag lug rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj hab cov tuabneeg tsi ncaaj ib yaam nkaus.
Yog mej tsuas hlub cov kws hlub mej xwb, mej xaav has tas Vaajtswv tseem yuav muab nqe zug rua mej hab nua los? Txawm yog cov tuabneeg sau se los puab tub paub hlub cov tuabneeg kws hlub puab hab.
Yog mej tsuas fwm mej cov kwvtij nkaus xwb, mej tsua ua tau zoo tshaaj lwm tug qhov twg? Txawm yog cov tuabneeg kws tsi paub Vaajtswv los puab tub paub sis fwm hab.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum ua zoo kawg nkaus, ib yaam le mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej, nwg yog tug zoo kawg nkaus.
“Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj, tsi xob coj Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai kuas lwm tug qhuas mej xwb. Yog mej ua le ntawd, mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej yuav tsi muab nqe zug rua mej.

“Yog le ntawd, thaus mej pub ib yaam dlaabtsi rua tej tuabneeg txomnyem, mej tsi xob qha rua tug nuav tug u, ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus ua nyob rua huv tej tsev saablaaj hab ntawm tej kev tshuam kuas luas qhuas puab. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, puab tub tau puab tej nqe zug lawm.
Tabsis thaus mej paab ib tug tuabneeg txomnyem, mej tsi xob pub mej saab teg txhumphem paub has tas mej saab teg xis ua dlaabtsi.
Thaus mej paab lwm tug, mej ca le paab tuabywv xwb, mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj pum tej kws mej ua tuabywv ua ntawd, nwg txhaj yuav muab nqe zug rua mej.

“Thaus mej thov Vaajtswv, mej tsi xob ua le cov tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus ua. Puab nyam moog sawv thov Vaajtswv huv tej tsev saablaaj hab ntawm tej kev tshuam kuas luas pum puab. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, puab tub tau puab tej nqe zug lawm.
Tabsis thaus mej thov Vaajtswv, mej ca le moog rua huv txaaj hab kaw rooj txaag tsaiv, mej maam le thov mej leej Txiv tug kws mej qhovmuag tsi pum. Nwg txhaj yuav muab nqe zug rua mej.
“Thaus mej thov Vaajtswv, tsi xob has moog has lug tej lug kws tsi muaj qaabhau ib yaam le cov tuabneeg tsi ntseeg Vaajtswv, puab xaav has tas yog puab thov ntev le ntawd Vaajtswv txhaj yuav nov.
Mej tsi xob ua le puab. Thaus mej tsi tau thov, mej leej Txiv tub paub tej kws mej xaav yuav lawm.
Mej yuavtsum thov le nuav: ‘Peb leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej; Thov kuas suavdlawg fwm koj lub npe;
thov koj lug kaav tuabneeg lub sab; thov koj paab kuas peb ua tau lawv le koj lub sab nyam ib yaam le cov kws nyob sau ntuj.
Thov koj pub mov rua peb muaj noj nub nua.
Thov koj zaam txim rua peb ib yaam le peb tub zaam txim rua cov kws ua txhum rua peb lawm.
Thov koj tsi xob ca tej kev sim sab ntxag tau peb, tabsis thov koj paab kuas peb dlim ntawm dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txais teg.’
“Yog mej zaam txim rua tug kws ua txhum rua mej lawm, mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej yuav zaam txim rua mej.
Tabsis yog mej tsi zaam txim rua lwm tug, mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej yuav tsi zaam txim rua mej hab.

“Thaus mej ua kevcai yoo mov, mej tsi xob ua ntsejmuag mluag mluag ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus. Puab ua txuj ua ntsejmuag mluag quas mlob, kuas suavdlawg paub has tas yog puab yoo mov. Kuv qha rua mej has tas, puab tub tau puab tej nqe zug lawm.
Tabsis thaus mej ua kevcai yoo mov, mej ca le ntxuav muag hab ntsis plaubhau,

kuas lwm tug tsi paub has tas yog mej yoo mov. Tsuas pub mej leej Txiv tug kws mej qhovmuag tsi pum paub xwb. Ces mej leej Txiv tug kws pum tej kws mej ua tuabywv ua, nwg txhaj yuav muab nqe zug rua mej.
“Mej tsi xob khaws nyaj txag hab qhov txhua chaw rua mej huv nplajteb nuav, rua qhov huv nplajteb nuav muaj ntsaum kaabrwg hab xeb noj, hab muaj tubsaab nyag.
Tabsis mej ca le khaws nyaj txag hab qhov txhua chaw ca rua mej sau ntuj ceebtsheej, qhov ntawd tsi muaj ntsaum kaabrwg hab xeb noj, hab tsi muaj tubsaab nyag.
Rua qhov mej tej nyaj txag hab qhov txhua chaw nyob qhov twg, mej lub sab yeej nyob qhov ntawd.
“Ob lub qhovmuag yog lub teeb kws ci rua lub cev pum kev. Yog mej ob lub qhovmuag pum kev tseeb, taagnrho mej lub cev yuav pum kev kaaj nrig;

tabsis yog mej ob lub qhovmuag pum kev tsi tseeb, taagnrho mej lub cev yuav tsaus ntuj nti. Yog has tas qhov pum kev kws mej muaj tsaus lawm, qhov tsaus ntawd tsuas muaj yuav tsaus heev zuj zug ntxiv xwb!

“Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav ua qhev tau rua ob tug tswv. Yog nwg ua le ntawd, nwg yuav ntxub ib tug hab nyam ib tug; nwg yuav fwm ib tug hab saib tsi taug ib tug. Yog mej yuav muab Vaajtswv hab nyaj txag saib hlub ib yaam nkaus yeej tsi tau.

“Vim le ntawd kuv txhaj qha rua mej, kuas mej tsi xob txhawj has tas mej yuavtsum muaj zaub mov noj lossis yuavtsum muaj rig tsho naav txhaj nyob taug, rua qhov txujsa tseemceeb dlua tej zaub mov, hab lub cev tseemceeb dlua tej rig tsho.

Mej sim ua tuab zoo xaav saib tej noog kws yaa sau nruab ntug, cov noog ntawd tsi cog qoobloo, tsi hlais hab tsi sau ntim rua huv txhaab; tabsis mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej tseem yug cov noog ntawd! Mej tseem muaj nqes dlua cov noog ntawd.
Mej tej kev txhawj ntawd puas yuav paab tau kuas mej muaj txujsa nyob ob peb xyoos ntxiv?
“Hab ua le caag mej yuav txhawj has tas mej yuav muab dlaabtsi naav? Mej sim saib tej paaj ntoos tom taj nraag tawg le caag. Tej paaj ntoos ntawd tub tsi ua num hab tsi ntus ntaub naav.
Tabsis kuv qha rua mej has tas, txawm yog Vaajntxwv Xalumoos muaj nyaj txag ntau kawg le los nwg tub tsi tau naav ib cev rig tsho zoo npaum le tej paaj ntoos ntawd ib lub.

Tej nroj tsuag kws nyob nub nua xwb, pigkig luas tub yuav muab pov hlawv rua huv qhovcub, ua cav Vaajtswv tub pub rua tej nroj tsuag ntawd zoo nkauj ua luaj. Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv yimfuab yuav pub rua mej muaj naav zoo dlua tej nroj tsuag ntawd. Ua le caag mej kev ntseeg yuav tsawg ua luaj!
“Yog le ntawd, mej tsi xob txhawj has tas: ‘Peb yuav muab dlaabtsi lug noj lug haus, hab lug naav?’
(Cov tuabneeg kws tsi ntseeg Vaajtswv, puab naj nub txhawj txug tej nuav.) Mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej yeej paub has tas, mej yuavtsum muaj tej nuav.
Tabsis mej yuavtsum xub nrhav Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws, hab ua lawv le Vaajtswv lub sab nyam tsaiv, Vaajtswv maam le muab tej nuav ntxiv rua mej.

Yog le ntawd, mej tsi xob txhawj rua pigkig, rua qhov pigkig yeej muaj kev txhawj txaus rua pigkig lawm. Kev nyuaj sab nub twg yeej muaj txaus rua nub ntawd lawm, tsi taag yuav moog nrhav kev nyuaj sab lug ntxiv.
“Mej tsi xob txav txim rua lwm tug, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav tsi txav txim rua mej,
rua qhov Vaajtswv yuav txav txim rua mej ib yaam le mej tau txav txim rua lwm tug, hab mej muab lub luaj le caag luj rua lwm tug lawm, lwm tug yuav muab lub luaj le ntawd luj rua mej.
Vim le caag mej yuav saib qhov nyuas moov ntoo kws nyob huv mej tug kwvtij lub qhovmuag, tabsis mej tsi paub has tas muaj ib yaav ntoo nyob huv mej lub qhovmuag.
Thaus tseem muaj ib yaav ntoo nyob huv mej lub qhovmuag, mej tsi xob has rua mej tug kwvtij has tas, ‘Ca kuv paab muab koj qhov nyuas moov ntoo kws nyob huv koj lub qhovmuag?’
Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus! Mej ca le xub muab yaav ntoo huv mej lub qhovmuag tsaiv, mej txhaj yuav pum kev muab qhov nyuas moov ntoo huv mej tug kwvtij lub qhovmuag.
“Mej tsi xob muab tej yaam kws muaj nqes pov rua dlev, nyob tsaam dlev tig lug tum mej. Mej tsi xob muab tej hlaws muaj nqes pov rua ntawm npua hauv ntej, npua yuav muab tsuj xwb.
“Mej thov, mej txhaj yuav tau; mej nrhav, mej txhaj yuav ntsib; mej khob, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav qheb qhovrooj rua mej.
Rua qhov txhua tug kws thov yeej yuav tau, txhua tug kws nrhav yeej yuav ntsib, hab txhua tug kws khob, Vaajtswv yeej yuav qheb qhovrooj rua nwg.
Mej cov kws yog leej txiv, yog mej tug mivnyuas thov mov, mej yuav muab pobzeb rua los?
Lossis yog tug mivnyuas thov ntseg, mej yuav muab naab rua los?

Txawm yog mej yog tuabneeg txhum los mej tseem paub muab yaam kws zoo rua mej tej mivnyuas. Yog le ntawd, mej leej Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej, nwg yimfuab yuav muab tej kws zoo dlua tej ntawd rua txhua tug kws thov nwg hab!
“Yog mej xaav kuas lwm tug ua le caag rua mej, mej yuavtsum ua ib yaam le ntawd rua lwm tug. Ua le nuav txhaj lawv le Mauxes txuj Kevcai hab lawv le cov cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg lawm.
“Mej yuavtsum moog lub qhovrooj nqaim, rua qhov lub qhovrooj luj hab txujkev dlaav coj moog rua ntuj tawg hab muaj coob leej taug txujkev ntawd,
Tabsis lub qhovrooj nqaim hab txujkev nqaim kws moog nyuaj yuav coj moog tau txujsa, cov tuabneeg kws taug txujkev ntawd tsi muaj coob leej.
“Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj cov cevlug cuav; thaus puab tuaj cuag mej, puab ua txuj ua le puab yog cov yaaj, tabsis puab lub sab phem ib yaam le maa.
Thaus mej pum puab teg num mej yuav paub. Tsob xuavpaug nqai hlau yeej tsi txi txiv maab, hab tsob ntoo xuavpaug paaj ntshaa yeej tsi txi txiv ncuav pas.
Ib yaam nkaus le ntawd, tsob ntoo zoo yeej txi cov txiv zoo, tsob ntoo phem yeej txi cov txiv phem.
Tsob ntoo zoo yeej tsi txi cov txiv phem, hab tsob ntoo phem yeej tsi txi cov txiv zoo.
Txhua tsob ntoo kws tsi txi cov txiv zoo, luas yuav muab ntuv hab muab pov rua huv cub suavtawg.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuav paub cov xwbfwb cuav lug ntawm puab teg num kws puab ua.
“Tsi yog txhua tug kws hu kuv has tas, ‘Tug Tswv, Tug Tswv,’ ces yuav tau moog Ntuj Ceebtsheej. Tabsis tsuas yog cov kws ua lawv le kuv Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj lub sab nyam, txhaj tau moog xwb.
Thaus txug nub ntawd yuav muaj ntau leej has rua kuv tas, ‘Tug Tswv, Tug Tswv, peb tub tuav koj lub npe qha Vaajtswv Txujlug, peb tuav koj lub npe ntab dlaab tawm, hab ua ntau yaam txujci tseemceeb!’
Thaus ntawd kuv yuav has rua puab tas, ‘Cov tuabneeg sab phem, ca le tsiv moog, kuv tsi paub mej!’
“Yog le ntawd txhua tug kws nov kuv tej lug hab ua lawv le tej lug ntawd, tug ntawd zoo ib yaam le tug kws muaj tswvyim, nwg ua nwg lub tsev rua sau pobzeb.
Thaus lug naag xub naag cua, dlej nyaab hab cua ntsawj lub tsev ntawd. Lub tsev ntawd tsi qaug, rua qhov nwg ua rua sau pobzeb.
“Tug kws nov kuv tej lug, tabsis tsi ua lawv le tej lug ntawd, tug ntawd zoo ib yaam le tug kws tsi muaj tswvyim, nwg ua nwg lub tsev rua sau cov xuabzeb.
Thaus lug naag xub naag cua, dlej nyaab hab cua ntsawj lub tsev ntawd, ces lub tsev ntawd txawm qaug hab puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi lawm!”
Thaus Yexus qha tej nuav taag lawm, cov tuabneeg kws tuaj noog Yexus qha ntawd xaav tsi thoob le.
Yexus muaj fwjchim qha hab Yexus qha tsi thooj le cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai qha.
Thaus Yexus nqeg peg roob lug, muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj lawv Yexus qaab.
Muaj ib tug txivneej mob ruas lug txhus caug ndlua ntawm Yexus hauv ntej thov has tas, “Tug Tswv, yog koj txaus sab khu kuv tug mob, koj yeej khu tau kuv zoo.”
Yexus txawm cev teg moog tuav nkaus tug ntawd hab has tas, “Kuv txaus sab paab koj. Koj tej ruas ca le zoo hlo!” Taamsim ntawd nwg tej ruas txawm zoo taag huv tuabsi lawm.

Yexus has rua nwg tas, “Koj tsi xob moog qha zaaj nuav rua leejtwg le, tabsis koj ca le ncaaj nraim moog cuag tug povthawj hab kuas nwg saib has tas koj tej ruas tub zoo lawm. Tom qaab ntawd koj ca le nqaa khoom moog fij rua Vaajtswv lawv le Mauxes tau qha tseg, suavdlawg txhaj paub has tas koj tub zoo lawm.”.
Thaus Yexus moog txug huv lub nroog Kapena-us, muaj ib tug thawj tubrog pawg pua tuaj cuag Yexus. Nwg thov Yexus has tas,
“Tug Tswv, kuv tug tubkhai mob heev tom tsev, nwg teg taw tub txhaav taag hab nwg txomnyem kawg.”
Yexus has tas, “Kuv yuav moog khu nwg.”
Tug thawj tubrog teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj tsi xob moog. Kuv yog ib tug kws tsi tsimnyog koj yuav moog huv kuv lub tsev. Thov koj has ib lus xwb ces kuv tug tubkhai yeej yuav zoo.

Txawm yog kuv los kuv tseem muaj ib cov thawj kws kaav kuv, hab kuv muaj ib cov tubrog kws kuv kaav. Yog kuv has rua tug nuav tas, ‘Moog!’ ces nwg txawm moog. Yog kuv has rua tug tod tas, ‘Lug!’ ces nwg txawm lug. Hab yog kuv has rua kuv tug tubkhai tas, ‘Ua le nuav!’ nwg txawm ua le ntawd.”

Thaus Yexus nov tug thawj tubrog has le ntawd, Yexus xaav tsi thoob le, Yexus txhaj tig moog has rua cov tuabneeg coob coob kws lawv Yexus qaab has tas, “Kuv qha rua mej has tas, txawm yog huv cov Yixalayees los kuv tsi tau pum ib tug kws muaj kev ntseeg npaum le nuav.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, yuav muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj saab nubtuaj hab tuaj saab nubpoob tuaj. Puab cov ntawd yuav nrug Anplahaas, Ixaj, hab Yakhauj puab nyob ua ke huv Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.

Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws tub tsimnyog yuav tau moog nyob huv Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws, puab yuav tsi tau moog, rua qhov puab tsi noog Vaajtswv lug. Puab yuav raug pov rua huv qhov kws tsaus ntuj nti. Puab yuav quaj qw tum nav qawv qhov ntawd”
Yexus txawm has rua tug thawj tubrog ntawd tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog tsev, koj tug tubkhai yuav zoo lawv le koj ntseeg.” Ces taamsim ntawd tug thawj tubrog tug tubkhai tom tsev txawm zoo lawm.
Thaus Yexus moog rua huv Petus tsev, Yexus pum Petus nam tais ua npaws hab pw sau txaaj.
Yexus tuav nwg txhais teg; ces nwg txawm zoo hab nwg sawv lug ua zaub ua mov rua Yexus noj.

Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj muaj tuabneeg coj tej tuabneeg kws raug dlaab tuaj cuag Yexus. Yexus has tuab lus xwb ces dlaab txawm tawm lawm, hab Yexus khu tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob txhua tug zoo huv tuabsi.
Yexus ua le ntawd kuas muaj tav lawv le Yaxayas tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg lawm has tas, “Nwg muab peb tej kev tsaug muas tshem hab nwg ris peb tej kev mob kev nkeeg moog lawm.”
Thaus Yexus pum muaj tuabneeg coob coob nyob puagncig nwg, Yexus txawm has rua cov thwjtim has tas, “Ca le moog rua saab havtxwv tim u.”
Muaj ib tug xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai tuaj cuag Yexus hab has tas, “Xwbfwb, kuv yuav nrug koj moog, txawm yog koj yuav moog qhov twg los kuv yuav nrug koj moog.”
Yexus teb tug ntawd has tas, “Txawm yog maa los muaj qhov nkaum, hab noog los muaj zeg, tabsis tuabneeg leej Tub tsi muaj chaw pw.”
Muaj dlua ib tug kws yog ib tug thwjtim has tas, “Tug Tswv, thov ca kuv moog log kuv txiv tsaiv, kuv maam le nrug koj moog.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog, ca cov tuabneeg tuag log puab tug tuag.”
Tom qaab ntawd Yexus nce moog rua huv lub nkoj, hab nwg cov thwjtim nrug nwg moog.
Taamsim ntawd txawm muaj cua dlaaj cua dlub hlub heev ntsawj dlej ndlaas lug ntaus lub nkoj ua rua lub nkoj tub yuav tog. Tabsis thaus ntawd Yexus pw tsaug zug lawm.
Cov thwjtim txawm moog tsaa Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, thov koj paab peb, peb tub yuav tuag!”
Yexus teb has tas, “Ua le caag mej yuav ntshai ua luaj? Ua le caag mej kev ntseeg yuav tsawg ua luaj?” Yexus txawm sawv tseeg lug txwv cua hab dlej, cua txawm tu hab dlej tsi ndlaas lawm.
Cov thwjtim xaav tsi thoob le, puab sis thaam has tas, “Tug nuav yog leejtwg, ua le caag cua hab dlej tsua noog nwg lug!”

Thaus Yexus moog txug ntawm cheebtsaam Nkadalas kws nyob rua saab ntug havtxwv tim u, Yexus txawm ntsib ob tug txivneej kws raug dlaab tawm tom roob toj ntxaas lug. Obtug nyaum kawg le, tsi muaj leejtwg kaam taug txujkev ntawd.
Thaus Yexus ntsib nthaav obtug, obtug txawm qw nrov nrov has tas, “Vaajtswv tug Tub, koj tuaj thaab wb ua dlaabtsi? Tub tsi tau txug lub sijhawm, koj txawm siv tuaj tsimtxom wb lawm los?”
Nyob tsi dleb ntawd, muaj ib paab npua coob coob taabtom nrhav noj.
Cov dlaab txawm thov Yexus has tas, “Yog koj yuav ntab peb tawm moog, thov ca peb moog rua huv paab npua ntawd.”
Yexus has rua cov dlaab ntawd tas, “Ca le moog.” Cov dlaab moog nkaag rua paab npua, ces paab npua txawm dlha moog poob tsaag tsua rua huv havtxwv tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws zuv npua ntawd txawm dlha moog rua huv nroog, qha tej xwm ntawd hab qha zaaj kws dlaab tawm huv ob tug txivneej ntawd rua suavdlawg noog.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv nroog txawm tawm tuaj saib Yexus; thaus puab pum Yexus, puab txawm thov kuas Yexus tawm huv puab cheebtsaam ntawd moog rua lwm qhov.
Yexus txawm nce moog rua huv nkoj hab hlaa havtxwv rov lug txug rua huv nwg lub nroog,

txawm muaj tuabneeg muab choj qhwv ib tug txivneej tuag teg tuag taw kwv tuaj cuag Yexus. Thaus Yexus pum has tas puab muaj kev ntseeg heev le ntawd, Yexus txhaj has rua tug tuag teg tuag taw ntawd has tas, “Mivtub, koj tsi xob nyuaj sab! Kuv tub zaam koj lub txim lawm.”
Muaj cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai qee leej sis thaam has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav has lug saib tsi taug Vaajtswv!”
Yexus tub paub tej kws puab has lawm, nwg txhaj has rua puab tas, “Ua le caag mej yuav xaav phem ua luaj le?
Lu lug kws has tas, ‘Kuv tub zaam koj lub txim lawm,’ lossis lu lug kws has tas, ‘Koj ca le sawv tseeg moog tsev. Ob lus nuav lu twg yuav yoojyim has dlua?’

Kuv ua le nuav qha rua mej paub has tas, Tuabneeg leej Tub muaj fwjchim huv nplajteb nuav zaam txim tau rua tuabneeg.” Yexus txhaj has rua tug txivneej kws tuag teg tuag taw ntawd has tas, “Koj ca le sawv hab nqaa koj dlaim choj moog tsev!”
Tug txivneej ntawd txawm sawv tseeg moog tsev lawm.
Thaus suavdlawg pum le ntawd, puab ntshai kawg hab puab ua Vaajtswv tsaug, rua qhov Vaajtswv tub pub fwjchim rua tuabneeg lawm.

Yexus txawm tawm qhov ntawd moog, thaus nwg taabtom taug kev moog, nwg pum ib tug txivneej sau se hu ua Mathais nyob quastsawg ntawm lub rooj sau se. Yexus has rua Mathais has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog.” Ces Mathais txawm sawv tseeg nrug Yexus moog.
Thaus Yexus taabtom noj mov huv Mathais tsev,  cov tuabneeg sau se hab cov tuabneeg txhum ntau leej tuaj nrug Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim nyob ntawm rooj noj mov ua ke.
Thaus cov Falixais pum le ntawd, puab txawm nug Yexus cov thwjtim has tas, “Ua le caag mej tug xwbfwb nrug cov tuabneeg sau se hab cov tuabneeg txhum noj mov ua ke?”
Yexus nov puab sis thaam le ntawd, nwg teb has tas, “Cov tuabneeg tsi muaj mob yeej tsi moog cuag kws tshuaj, tsuas yog cov tuabneeg muaj mob txhaj moog cuag kws tshuaj xwb.

Mej ca le moog nyeem Vaajtswv Txujlug kws has tas, ‘Qhov kws kuv xaav tau yog kuas mej muaj lub sab hlub, tsi yog tug tsaj kws muab tua theej txhoj,’ rua qhov kuv tsi yog lug hu cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tabsis yog kuv lug hu cov tuabneeg txhum.”

Tom qaab ntawd Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai rau dlej cov thwjtim txawm tuaj nug Yexus has tas, “Ua le caag peb cov hab cov Falixais pheej ua kevcai yoo mov, tabsis koj cov thwjtim tsi ua le?”

Yexus teb puab has tas, “Mej xaav has tas thaus tug nraug vauv tseem nrug nwg cov phoojywg noj tshoob ua ke, puab yuav nyuaj sab nua los? Puab yeej tsi nyuaj sab le! Tabsis thaus txug lub sijhawm kws luas coj tug nraug vauv moog lawm, ces puab yuav yoo mov.”
“Yeej tsi muaj leejtwg yuav muab ib dlaim ntaub tshab lug ntxiv lub tsho qub, yog nwg ua le ntawd, dlaim ntaub tshab yuav dlua ua rua lub tsho qub hajyam ndluag luj xwb.

Hab tsi muaj leejtwg yuav muab cov cawv txiv maab tshab ntim rua huv lub naab tawv qub. Yog nwg ua le ntawd lub naab tawv qub yuav tawg, cov cawv txiv maab yuav lug taag, hab lub naab tawv yuav tsi zoo siv lawm. Tabsis cov cawv txiv maab tshab yuavtsum muab ntim rua huv lub naab tawv tshab, lub naab tawv txhaj tsi tawg, cov cawv txiv maab txhaj tsi txeej.”

Thaus Yexus tseem taabtom has le ntawd rua puab, cov Yudais ib tug nom txawm tuaj txhus caug ntawm Yexus kutaw hab thov has tas, “Kuv tug ntxhais nyavnyuas tu sav nrho nuav, thov koj moog tsaa teg rua sau nwg, nwg txhaj yuav caj rov lug.”
Yexus txawm sawv tseeg nrug tug nom ntawd moog, Yexus cov thwjtim nrug Yexus moog hab.
Thaus ntawd muaj ib tug quaspuj kws coj khaub dluag tau kaum ob xyoos tsi tu le, nwg txiv ntag lug rua ntawm Yexus nrausqaum hab kov Yexus lub tw tsho.
Nwg xaav has tas, “Yog kuv kov Yexus lub tw tsho, kuv tug mob yuav zoo.”
Yexus tig hlo saib tug quaspuj ntawd, hab has rua nwg tas, “Mivntxhais, koj tsi xob nyuaj sab! Vim koj ntseeg, koj tug mob txhaj zoo lawm.” Taamsim ntawd tug quaspuj ntawd tug mob txawm zoo hlo lawm.
Thaus Yexus moog txug huv tug nom ntawd lub tsev, nwg pum cov tuabneeg tshuab qeej ntaus nruag hab suavdlawg quaj nyav ntshu nrooj.
Yexus txawm has kuas cov tuabneeg ntawd tawm moog rua nrau zoov hab has tas, “Tug ntxhais nuav tsi tuag, nwg tsaug zug xwb!” Ces suavdlawg txawm luag Yexus zum zawg.
Thaus cov tuabneeg tawm moog taag lawm, Yexus txawm moog rua huv chaav kws puab tso tug ntxhais ntawd hab tuav nkaus tug ntxhais txhais teg, ces tug ntxhais ntawd txawm sawv tseeg.
Zaaj nuav nrov nchaa moo lug moog thoob plawg cheebtsaam ntawd.
Thaus Yexus tawm qhov ntawd hab taug kev moog, muaj ob tug txivneej dligmuag lawv nwg qaab. Obtug hu Yexus nrov nrov has tas, “Daviv tug Tub, thov koj hlub wb!”
Thaus Yexus moog rua huv tsev lawm, ob tug txivneej dligmuag ntawd txawm lug cuag nwg. Yexus nug obtug has tas, “Meb puas ntseeg has tas kuv khu tau meb?” Obtug teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, wb ntseeg.”
Ces Yexus txawm kov obtug ob lub qhovmuag hab has tas, “Ca le muaj lawv le meb ntseeg!”
Obtug txawm rov pum kev le qub lawm. Yexus txwv obtug has tas, “Meb tsi xob qha zaaj nuav rua leejtwg le!”
Tabsis obtug tawm moog hab qha Yexus lub moo nrov nchaa lug moog thoob plawg cheebtsaam ntawd.
Thaus ob tug txivneej dligmuag ntawd taabtom tawm moog, txawm muaj tuabneeg coj ib tug txivneej kws raug dlaab hab has tsi tau lug tuaj cuag Yexus.
Thaus Yexus ntab dlaab tawm lawm, taamsim ntawd tug txivneej ntawd txawm has tau lug. Suavdlawg xaav tsi thoob hab has tas, “Peb tsi tau pum dlua le nuav nyob huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees le!”
Tabsis cov Falixais has tas, “Yog Ntxwgnyoog kws yog cov dlaab tug thawj pub fwjchim rua nwg, nwg txhaj ntab tau dlaab tawm.”

Yexus moog txhua nrho huv tej nroog hab huv tej zog. Nwg qhuab qha huv tej tsev saablaaj, nwg qha Txujmoo Zoo kws has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws, hab khu tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob, txawm yog tug mob le caag los Yexus khu tau zoo huv tuabsi.
Thaus Yexus saib cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd, nwg hlub puab kawg le, rua qhov puab ntxhuv sab hab tsi muaj leejtwg paab puab, puab zoo ib yaam le paab yaaj kws tsi muaj tug tswv yug.
Ces Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Cov nplej kws zoo hlais lawm muaj ntau, tabsis cov tuabneeg kws hlais muaj tsawg.
Mej ca le thov tug tswv teb kuas nwg khaiv dlua ib co tuabneeg moog paab hlais nwg cov nplej.”
Yexus hu nwg kaum ob tug thwjtim lug rua ntawm nwg. Nwg muab fwjchim rua puab ntab tau dlaab tawm hab khu tau txhua yaam mob huv tuabsi.
Kaum ob tug timthawj ntawd npe hu le nuav: Ximoos (tug kws hu ua Petus) hab nwg tug kwv Aadales; Yakaunpaus hab nwg tug kwv Yauhaas, obtug yog Xenpedais tub;
Filis hab Npataulaumais; Thaumas hab Mathais kws yog tug sau se; Yakaunpaus kws yog Alafais tug tub, hab Thade-us;
Ximoos, tug kws xaav kuas nwg tsaav tuabneeg muaj kev ywjpheej, hab Yudas Ixakali-us, tug kws ntxeev sab rua Yexus.
Yexus khaiv kaum ob tug thwjtim moog hab nwg qha rua puab has tas: “Mej tsi xob moog rua huv lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg, hab tsi xob moog huv cov Xamalis tej nroog.
Tabsis mej ca le moog nrhav cov tuabneeg Yixalayees, rua qhov puab zoo le paab yaaj kws pluj lawm.
Mej ca le moog qha has tas ‘Ntuj Ceebtsheej tub lug ze lawm!’

Mej ca le moog khu tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob, tsaa cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm sawv rov qaab lug, khu cov tuabneeg mob ruas hab ntab dlaab tawm. Kuv pub lub fwjchim dlawb dlawb rua mej, yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum pub dlawb rua lwm tug, tsi xob yuav nqe.
Mej tsi xob nqaa kub, nyaj lossis txaj toog lab rua huv mej tej naab tshos moog;
Mej moog, mej tsi xob khuam naab thoobpuab, tsi xob npaaj tsho moog hloov, tsi xob nqaa khau lossis paas nreg moog. Rua qhov tug kws ua num yeej tsimnyog luas pub rua nwg noj nwg naav.

“Thaus mej moog txug huv ib lub nroog twg lossis huv ib lub zog twg, mej ca le moog rua huv tug kws txaus sab hu mej moog su huv nwg tsev, hab nyob huv nwg tsev moog txug thaus mej tawm huv lub nroog ntawd moog.
Thaus mej moog huv leejtwg tsev, mej yuavtsum xub has lug noj qaab nyob zoo rua puab.
Yog tsev tuabneeg ntawd hu mej moog huv puab tsev, puab yuav tau koob moov, tabsis yog puab tsi hu mej moog huv puab tsev, puab yuav tsi tau koob moov le.
Yog tsev tuabneeg twg lossis lub nroog twg tsi hu mej hab tsi noog tej lug kws mej qha, ces thaus mej tawm moog, mej ca le nchus tej moov aav kws lu mej kutaw povtseg.
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas Nub kws Vaajtswv Txav Txim, nwg yuav rau txim rua lub nroog ntawd nyaav dlua le nwg rau txim rua lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas!
“Mej ca le noog kuv has! Kuv khaiv mej moog ib yaam le paab yaaj kws yuav moog rua huv paab maa. Mej yuavtsum ntse ib yaam le tug naab hab muaj lub sab mog sab muas ib yaam le tug nquab.
Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj, rua qhov yuav muaj tuabneeg nteg mej coj moog rua huv tsev tu plaub, hab luas yuav muab mej nplawm huv tej tsev saablaaj.
Luas yuav coj mej moog sawv taabmeeg tej numtswv hab cov vaajntxwv, puab yuav taug mej zaaj, vim mej ua kuv teg num, mej txhaj yuav muaj sijhawm qha Txujmoo Zoo rua puab hab rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg.
Thaus puab coj mej moog taug mej zaaj, mej tsi xob txhawj has tas, mej yuav has le caag. Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, Vaajtswv yuav qha kuas mej paub has.
Tej lug kws mej yuav has, tsi yog mej lug, tabsis yog mej leej Txiv tug Ntsujplig qha rua mej.
“Tij yuav muab kwv, kwv yuav muab tij coj moog cob rua luas tua. Txiv yuav ua ib yaam le ntawd rua tej mivnyuas, hab mivnyuas yuav tawmtsaam nam txiv, hab coj moog rua luas tua.
Txhua tug yuav ntxub mej, vim mej yog cov kws ntseeg kuv, tabsis tug kws ua sab ntev moog txug thaus kawg, tug ntawd yuav dlim.

Yog lub nroog twg tsimtxom mej, mej ca le tsiv moog rua lwm lub nroog. Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, thaus mej tseem tsi tau moog qha thoob tej nroog huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees, Tuabneeg leej Tub tub lug lawm.
“Tsi muaj ib tug tub kawm ntawv kws yuav paub tshaaj nwg tug xwbfwb, hab tsi muaj ib tug tubqhe kws yuav muaj fwjchim dlua nwg tug tswv.

Yog ib tug tub kawm ntawv paub le nwg tug xwbfwb lawm, hab tug tubqhe muaj fwjchim npaum le nwg tug tswv, kuj zoo lawm. Yog tug tswv tsev tub tau lub npe hu ua Npexenpus lawm, ces nwg tsev tuabneeg hajyam yuav tau lub npe phem dlua le ntawd hab!

“Yog le ntawd, mej tsi xob ntshai tuabneeg, rua qhov tej kws tuabneeg muab npog ca lawm, yuav muaj tug muab nthuav lug rua suavdlawg saib, hab tej kws tsi muaj leejtwg paub, yuav muaj tug muab qha rua suavdlawg.
Tej kws kuv qha rua mej thaus tsaus ntuj, nruab nub mej yuavtsum qha rua suavdlawg, hab tej kws kuv has tuabywv rua mej, mej yuavtsum moog qha rua suavdlawg nov.
Mej tsi xob ntshai tug kws tua tau mej lub cev, tabsis tua tsi tau mej tug ntsujplig. Mej yuavtsum ntshai Vaajtswv tug kws muab tau mej lub cev hab mej tug ntsujplig pov rua huv ntuj tawg.
Ob tug noog tsev, luas muag ob xus xwb puas yog? Tabsis yog mej leej Txiv tsi pum zoo ca ib tug poob rua huv aav, yeej tsi poob le.
Hab txawm yog mej tej plaubhau los Vaajtswv tub suav txhua txuj huv tuabsi lawm.
Yog le ntawd, mej tsi xob ntshai; mej muaj nqes heev dlua ntau tug noog tsev!
“Tug kws leeg taabmeeg suavdlawg has tas, nwg yog kuv le, ces kuv yuav leeg yuav tug ntawd taabmeeg kuv Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej ib yaam le ntawd.
Tabsis tug kws tsi leeg yuav kuv taabmeeg suavdlawg, kuv yuav tsi leeg tug ntawd taabmeeg kuv Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej.
“Mej tsi xob xaav has tas, yog kuv coj kev thaajyeeb lug rua nplajteb. Tsi yog le ntawd, kuv tsi coj kev thaajyeeb lug, tabsis kuv coj ntaaj lug.
Kuv lug yog lug ua kuas tub tawmtsaam txiv, ntxhais tawmtsaam nam, hab nyaab tawmtsaam puj;
Yug cov yeebncuab kws phem tshaaj yog yug tsev tuabneeg.
“Tug kws hlub nwg nam nwg txiv heev dlua hlub kuv, tug ntawd tsi tsimnyog ua kuv tug thwjtim; tug kws hlub nwg tej tub tej ntxhais heev dlua hlub kuv, tug ntawd tsi tsimnyog ua kuv tug thwjtim.
Tug kws tsi kwv nwg tug ntoo khaublig nrug kuv moog, tug ntawd tsi tsimnyog ua kuv tug thwjtim.
Tug kws khauvxwm nwg txujsa, tug ntawd yuav tsi tau txujsa, tabsis tug kws tsi khauvxwm nwg txujsa vim nwg ntseeg kuv, tug ntawd yuav tau txujsa.
“Tug kws tog txais mej, tub yog nwg tog txais kuv; hab tug kws tog txais kuv, tub yog tug ntawd tog txais tug kws khaiv kuv lug.

Tug kws tog txais Vaajtswv ib tug tubkhai, vim nwg paub has tas tug ntawd yog tug kws qha Vaajtswv txujlug, ces nwg yuav tau nqe zug ib yaam le tug tubkhai ntawd. Tug kws tog txais ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, rua qhov nwg paub has tas tug ntawd yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, ces nwg yuav tau nqe zug ib yaam le tug ntawd.
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, tug kws muab ib khob dlej txag rua kuv cov thwjtim tug kws yau dlua ndlais haus, vim nwg paub has tas tug ntawd yog kuv tug thwjtim, ces nwg yuav tau nqe zug.”
Thaus Yexus qha nwg kaum ob tug thwjtim taag lawm, nwg txawm tawm qhov ntawd moog qha hab qhuab qha rua huv tej nroog kws nyob ze ntawd.
Thaus Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej tseem raug kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj nov txug tej kws Yexus naj nub ua, nwg txawm khaiv nwg cov thwjtim qee leej moog cuag Yexus.
Puab tuaj nug Yexus has tas, “Thov koj qha rua peb saib koj puas yog tug kws Yauhaas has tas yuav lug lossis peb tseem yuav tog dlua lwm tug?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Mej ca le rov moog qha tej kws mej nov hab tej kws mej pum lawm rua Yauhaas has tas,

cov tuabneeg dligmuag rov pum kev, cov tuabneeg tuag ceg moog taug kev, cov tuabneeg mob ruas zoo,  cov tuabneeg laag ntseg nov lug, cov tuabneeg tuag lawm sawv rov lug hab tub muaj tuabneeg moog qha Txujmoo Zoo rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem lawm.
Tug kws ntseeg kuv, tug ntawd tau koob moov.”

Thaus Yauhaas cov thwjtim rov moog lawm, Yexus txawm has rua cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd tas, “Thaus mej moog cuag Yauhaas tom roob mojsaab qhua, mej moog saib dlaabtsi? Mej moog saib tug lojkov kws cua tshuab rawv moog rawv lug los?
Mej moog saib dlaabtsi? Mej moog saib tug kws naav tej tsoog tsho zoo zoo los? Tsuas yog cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv vaajntxwv lub loog txhaj tau naav zoo xwb!
Mej qha rua kuv saib, mej moog saib dlaabtsi? Moog saib ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug los? Yog lawm, tabsis tug kws mej pum ntawd muaj fwjchim luj dlua ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug.
Tug Yauhaas nuav yog tug kws Vaajtswv Txujlug tub xub qha tseg lawm. Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Kuv yuav khaiv kuv tug tubkhai ua koj ntej moog khu kev tog koj.’

Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, txhua tug kws yug lug ntawm quaspuj, tsi muaj ib tug muaj fwjchim npaum le Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej. Tabsis tug kws yau tshaaj nyob sau Ntuj Ceebtsheej, tug ntawd tseem muaj fwjchim luj dlua Yauhaas hab.

Txij thaus Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej qhuab qha lug txug naj nub nua, muaj cov tuabneeg kws tawmtsaam  qhov kws tuabneeg moog Ntuj Ceebtsheej. Hab muaj cov tuabneeg kws siv zug txeeb kuas tau moog Ntuj Ceebtsheej.
Cov cev Vaajtswv lug hab Mauxes txuj Kevcai yeej qha txug Ntuj Ceebtsheej lug txug rua Yauhaas; hab
yog mej ntseeg tej lug kws puab qha ntawd, mej yeej yuav ntseeg has tas Yauhaas yog Eliyas tug kws puab has tas, nwg yuav lug.
Yog le ntawd, leejtwg muaj qhovntsej ca le noog!
“Kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg tam nuav pev rua dlaabtsi? Puab zoo ib yaam le tej mivnyuas yau kws ua si tom tshaav puam. Paab nuav has rua paab tod tas,
‘Peb tub tshuab raaj lawm, tabsis mej tsi seev cev! Peb quaj nyav, tabsis mej tsi mob sab!’
Yauhaas lug, nwg ua kevcai yoo mov hab nwg tsi haus cawv txiv maab, suavdlawg txhaj has tas, ‘Nwg raug dlaab lawm!’

Tuabneeg leej Tub lug, nwg noj hab haus, suavdlawg txhaj has tas, ‘Mej saib, tug tuabneeg nuav noj luj haus luj, nwg nrug cov tuabneeg kws sau se hab cov tuabneeg txhum ua phoojywg!’ Tug kws pum Vaajtswv teg num, tug ntawd yuav paub tseeb has tas Vaajtswv yog tug muaj tswvyim.”
Yexus txawm tshev cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tej nroog kws Yexus tau moog ua txujci tseemceeb ntau zag lawm, rua qhov puab tsi kaam tso puab tej kev txhum tseg.

“Lub nroog Khaulaxis, koj yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! Lub nroog Npexaidas, koj yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! Tej txujci tseemceeb kws tub ua rua meb pum lawm, yog ua tej ntawd rua huv lub nroog Tiles hab lub nroog Xidoos, ces cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv ob lub nroog ntawd tub xub muab naab tsaaj lug npua hab tsuab tshauv nphoo rua ib ce ntxuv lug lawm! Puab yuav ua le ntawd kuas suavdlawg paub has tas, puab tub tso puab tej kev txhum tseg lawm.
Kuv qha rua meb has tas, nub kws Vaajtswv txav txim, nwg yuav rau txim rua meb nyaav dlua rau txim rua lub nroog Tiles hab lub nroog Xidoos.

Lub nroog Kapena-us, koj yuav tsaav koj lub fwjchim moog kuas txij ntuj los? Yuav muab koj pov moog rua huv ntuj tawg! Yog has tas tej txujci tseemceeb kws ua rua koj pum lawm, ua rua huv lub nroog Xaudoos, lub nroog ntawd yeej yuav nyob lug txug naj nub nua.
Kuv qha rua koj has tas, nub kws Vaajtswv txav txim, nwg yuav rau txim rua koj nyaav dlua le nwg rau txim rua lub nroog Xaudoos!”

Thaus ntawd Yexus has tas, “Txiv, koj yog tug Tswv kws kaav lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb nuav! Kuv ua koj tsaug, rua qhov koj tub muab tej nuav zais ca tsi qha rua cov tuabneeg muaj tswvyim hab txawj ntse paub, tabsis koj qha tej ntawd rua cov tuabneeg kws tsi txawj tsi ntse paub xwb.
Txiv, koj yeej pum zoo ca ua le ntawd.

“Kuv Txiv tub muab ib puas tsaav yaam tso rua kuv lawm. Tsi muaj leejtwg paub leej Tub, tsuas yog leej Txiv txhaj paub xwb, hab tsi muaj leejtwg paub leej Txiv, tsuas yog leej Tub hab cov kws leej Tub pum zoo qha rua txhaj paub xwb.
“Mej cov kws saab saab vim ris nraa nyaav, mej ca le lug cuag kuv, kuv yuav ca mej su.
Kuv yog tug kws muaj sab dlawb sab zoo, yog le ntawd, mej ca le lug kwv kuv tug quabtwg hab kawm tej kws kuv qha, mej txhaj yuav tau su.
Tug quabtwg kws kuv muab rua mej kwv yoojyim kwv, hab lub nraa kws kuv muab rua mej ris, lub ntawd tsi nyaav.”
Tsi ntev tom qaab ntawd, nub Xanpataus Yexus taug kev moog txug huv ib dlaim teb npleg. Yexus cov thwjtim tshaib plaab, puab txawm dle naab nplej lug tev noj.
Thaus cov Falixais pum cov thwjtim ua le ntawd, puab has rua Yexus has tas, “Koj saib, nub Xanpataus koj cov thwjtim ua le ntawd, puab ua txhum peb txuj Kevcai lawm!”
Yexus teb has tas, “Mej tsi tau nyeem zaaj kws Daviv ua thaus kws Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg tshaib plaab los?

Daviv moog rua huv Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg muab tej ncuav kws tub muab fij rua Vaajtswv lawm lug noj, txawm yog Vaajtswv txuj kevcai txwv tsi pub lwm tug noj tej ncuav ntawd, tsuas yog cov povthawj txhaj noj tau xwb los puab tseem muab noj hab.
Lossis mej tsi tau nyeem txuj Kevcai kws has tas, txhua nub Xanpataus cov povthawj kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev ua txhum kevcai nub Xanpataus, tabsis tsi muaj tuabneeg has tas, puab ua txhum nua los?
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, nyob ntawm nuav muaj ib yaam kws tseemceeb dlua lub Tuamtsev.

Vaajtswv Txujlug has tas, ‘Qhov kws kuv xaav tau, yog kuas mej muaj lub sab hlub, tsi yog tug tsaj kws muab tua theej txhoj.’ Yog mej totaub zaaj nuav lawm, mej yuav tsi rau txim rua cov kws tsi tau ua txhum;
rua qhov Tuabneeg leej Tub yog tug Tswv nub Xanpataus.”
Yexus tawm qhov ntawd hab moog rua huv ib lub tsev saablaaj,
Muaj ib tug txivneej qhuav teg nyob qhov ntawd. Cov tuabneeg kws tuaj nyob ntawd muaj qee leej xaav nrhav txim rua Yexus, puab txawm nug Yexus has tas, “Khu mob nub Xanpataus puas txhum Kevcai?”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Yog mej cov leejtwg muaj ib tug yaaj poob qhov tshij Nub Xanpataus, mej tsi moog muab rhu tawm los?
Tuabneeg muaj nqes heev dlua tug yaaj! Yog le ntawd, txuj Kevcai yeej pub peb paab tuabneeg nub Xanpataus.”
Ces Yexus has rua tug txivneej qhuav teg ntawd tas, “Koj ca le xyaab koj txhais teg.” Nwg txawm xyaab hlo nwg txhais teg, ua cav nwg txhais teg txawm zoo hlo ib yaam le saab kws tsi qhuav lawm.
Cov Falixais txawm tawm moog saablaaj saib yuav ua le caag puab txhaj tua tau Yexus.
Thaus Yexus paub le ntawd, nwg txawm tawm qhov chaw ntawd moog; hab muaj tuabneeg coob coob nrug nwg moog. Yexus khu tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob txhua tug zoo huv tuabsi,
hab nwg txwv tsi pub puab moog qha nwg rua leejtwg le.
Nwg ua le nuav kuas muaj tav lawv le Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg lawm has tas:

“Tug nuav yog kuv tug tubkhai kws kuv xaiv tseg lawm, kuv hlub nwg hab kuv txaus sab rua nwg, kuv yuav tso kuv tug Ntsujplig lug rua sau nwg. Hab nwg yuav qha kuv txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg paub.
Nwg yuav tsi nrug leejtwg sis caav sis tshe, lossis qw nrov nrov, lossis nwg yuav tsi has lug nrov nrov ntawm tej kev.
Tug lojkov kws po lawm, nwg yuav tsi muab luv, lossis lub teeb kws tub yuav tuag, nwg yuav tsi tshuab kuas tuag. Nwg yuav ua sab ntev moog txug thaus txujkev ncaaj nceeg kovyeej lawm.
Hab txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav ca sab rua nwg.”
Thaus ntawd muaj tuabneeg coj ib tug txivneej dligmuag hab has tsi tau lug tuaj cuag Yexus, rua qhov nwg raug dlaab. Yexus khu tug txivneej ntawd zoo, nwg txawm has tau lug hab pum kev lawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws pum Yexus ua le ntawd, puab xaav tsi thoob le, puab sis nug has tas, “Nwg puas yog Daviv tug Tub?”
Thaus cov Falixais nov suavdlawg has le ntawd, puab teb has tas, “Nwg ntab tau dlaab tawm tub yog Npexenpus kws yog dlaab tug thawj pub fwjchim rua nwg ntab.”

Yexus tub paub tej kws puab xaav hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Yog ib lub tebchaws twg tawg ua ob peb paab lawm, hab cov tuabneeg ntawd sis ntaus sis tua, ces lub tebchaws ntawd yuav puamtsuaj moog. Hab ib lub nroog twg lossis ib tsev tuabneeg twg tawg ua ob peb paab lawm, hab cov tuabneeg ntawd sis ntaus sis tua, ces puab yeej yuav tawg taag moog.
Yog cov tuabneeg kws dlaab Ntxwgnyoog kaav sis ntaus sis tua, ces kuj pev ib yaam le puab tub tawg ua ob peb paab lawm, tsi ntev puab yuav tawg moog taag!

Mej has tas yog Npexenpus pub fwjchim rua kuv ntab tau dlaab. Yog le ntawd, yog leejtwg pub fwjchim rua mej cov tuabneeg kws ntab tau dlaab ntab dlaab? Mej cov tuabneeg kws ntab dlaab yog cov kws yuav txav txim rua mej!
Tsi yog le mej has! Tabsis yog Vaajtswv tug Ntsujplig pub fwjchim rua kuv, kuv txhaj ntab tau dlaab. Qhov ntawd qha rua mej paub has tas Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tub lug txug mej lawm.

“Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav tsoo moog tau rua huv tug txivneej kws muaj zug lub tsev hab fuab nwg tej qhov txhua chaw, tsuas yog nwg xub muab tug kws muaj zug ntawd khi tsaiv, nwg txhaj fuab tau tej qhov txhua chaw huv tug ntawd tsev.
“Tug kws tsi tuaj kuv tog, tug ntawd yeej tawmtsaam kuv. Tug kws tsi koom nrug kuv, tug ntawd ua kuas tawg paab tawg pawg.

Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj has rua mej has tas, txhua yaam kev txhum kws tuabneeg ua lossis txhua lu lug phem kws tuabneeg has,  Vaajtswv zaam txim tau, tabsis yog leejtwg thuam Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, Vaajtswv yuav zaam txim tsi tau rua tug ntawd.

Yog leejtwg thuam Tuabneeg leej Tub, Vaajtswv zaam txim tau rua tug ntawd, tabsis yog leejtwg thuam Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, Vaajtswv yuav zaam txim tsi tau rua tug ntawd, tsi has tam nuav lossis tam tom ntej.
“Tsob ntoo zoo yeej txi cov txiv zoo; tsob ntoo phem yeej txi cov txiv phem. Yog yug pum cov txiv yug yeej paub has tas tsob ntoo ntawd yog tsob phem lossis tsob zoo.
Cov nam naab! Mej yog tuabneeg sab phem, mej yuav ua le caag has tau lug zoo! Rua qhov lub sab xaav le caag, lub ncauj yeej has le ntawd.
Tug tuabneeg sab zoo yeej has tej lug zoo; hab tug tuabneeg sab phem yeej has tej lug phem.”
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, “Nub kws Vaajtswv txav txim, txhua tug nyag yuavtsum tau leeg txhua lu lug tsi muaj qaabhau kws nyag tau has lawm rua Vaajtswv.
Mej yuav raug txim lossis tsi raug, yog nyob ntawm tej lug kws mej has.”
Cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv Kevcai hab cov Falixais qee leej tuaj has rua Yexus has tas, “Xwbfwb, peb xaav kuas koj ua ib yaam txujci tseemceeb rua peb saib.”

Yexus teb has tas, “Cov tuabneeg tam nuav ua phem ua qas hab tsi ntseeg Vaajtswv le. Mej xaav kuas kuv ua ib yaam txujci tseemceeb rua mej saib nua los? Kuv yuav tsi ua! zaaj txujci kws mej yuav pum, tsuas yog Yaunas zaaj xwb.
Yaunas nyob huv tug ntseg kws luj luj lub plaab tau peb nub peb mos le caag, Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav nyob huv nruab aa peb nub peb mos ib yaam le ntawd.

Nub kws Vaajtswv txav txim, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Nineves yuav sawv qha mej tej kev txhum rua mej, rua qhov thaus puab nov Yaunas qha, puab txawm tso puab tej kev txhum tseg. Kuv qha rua mej has tas muaj ib tug nyob ntawm nuav, nwg tseem muaj fwjchim luj dlua Yaunas hab!

Nub kws Vaajtswv txav txim, tug puj vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Senpas yuav sawv qha mej tej kev txhum rua mej, rua qhov nwg tuaj nraag nwg lub tebchaws tuaj noog Vaajntxwv Xalumoos pav nwg tej kev txawj ntse; kuv qha rua mej has tas muaj ib tug nyob ntawm nuav, nwg tseem muaj fwjchim luj dlua Vaajntxwv Xalumoos hab!
“Thaus dlaab tawm huv ib tug tuabneeg lub cev moog lawm, tug dlaab ntawd txawm moog rua tom roob mojsaab qhua hab nrhav chaw su. Yog nwg nrhav tsi tau,
nwg yuav has tas, ‘Kuv yuav rov qaab moog rua tom kuv lub qub tsev kws kuv tawm tuaj.’ Thaus nwg rov lug txug nwg lub qub tsev, ua cav tsi muaj leejtwg nyob, hab tub tu dlu lug ca lawm.

Nwg txawm moog coj xyaa tug dlaab kws nyaum dlua nwg lug nrug nwg nyob huv lub tsev ntawd. Thaus kawg tug tuabneeg ntawd hajyam txomnyem heev dlua thaus chivthawj. Cov tuabneeg sab phem tam nuav yuav raug kev txomnyem ib yaam le ntawd ntaag.”
Thaus Yexus tseem taabtom qha cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd, ces Yexus nam hab Yexus cov kwv txawm tuaj txug. Puab sawv saab nrau hab puab has tas, puab xaav nrug Yexus thaam.
Muaj ib tug has rua Yexus has tas, “Koj nam hab koj cov kwv tuaj sawv saab nrau, puab xaav nrug koj thaam.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Leejtwg yog kuv nam? Leejtwg yog kuv cov kwv?”
Yexus taw teg rua cov thwjtim hab has tas, “Cov nuav yog kuv nam hab kuv cov kwv.
Tug kws ua lawv le kuv Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej lub sab nyam, tug ntawd yog kuv tug kwv, kuv tug muam, hab kuv nam.”
Tuab nub ntawd Yexus txawm tawm huv tsev moog nyob quastsawg nraag ntug havtxwv.
Muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj nyob puagncig Yexus, nwg txhaj nce moog rua huv lub nkoj, ces cov tuabneeg coob coob sawv ntawm ntug dlej.
Yexus ua lug pevtxwv qha ntau zaaj rua puab noog has tas, “Muaj ib tug txivneej nqaa noob nplej moog tseb.
Thaus nwg tseb cov noob nplej rua huv dlaim teb, muaj qee lub poob rua huv plawv kev, ces noog txawm lug khaws noj lawm.
Muaj qee lub poob rua ntawm qhov aav kws huv muaj pobzeb tiv lawm. Cov noob ntawd tuaj sai sai, vim aav tsi tub.
Thaus tshaav ntuj kub, cov kaug ntsws hab qhuav lawm; vim tug caag ntsa aav tsi tub.
Muaj qee lub poob rua huv qaab tsob xuavpaug, ces tsob xuavpaug hlub tuaj laum tsob nplej ntawd tuag taag lawm.
Muaj qee lub poob rua ntawm qhov aav zoo, cov ntawd txhawv taug. Qee naab txi tau ib puas lub, qee naab txi tau rau caum lub, hab qee naab txi tau peb caug lub.”
Yexus xaus lug has tas, “Yog leejtwg muaj qhovntsej ca le noog!”
Cov thwjtim lug nug Yexus has tas, “Ua le caag koj pheej ua lug pevtxwv qha puab xwb?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Zaaj kws tuabneeg tsi tau paub has txug Ntuj Ceebtsheej, kuv tub qha rua mej lawm, tabsis tsi tau qha rua cov tuabneeg ntawd paub.
Rua qhov tug kws tub muaj lawm, yeej yuav muab ntxiv kuas nwg muaj nplua mag, tabsis tug kws tsi muaj, txawm yog nwg tsuas muaj mivntsiv xwb los Vaajtswv yuav muab rhu moog huv tuabsi.
Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj ua lug pevtxwv qha xwb, rua qhov yog puab saib los puab tsi pum, puab noog tabsis puab tsi nov hab tsi totaub.

Ua le ntawd txhaj muaj tav lawv le Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau has tseg tas: ‘Mej yuav noog taag noog thab, tabsis mej yuav tsi totaub; mej yuav saib taag saib thab, tabsis mej yuav tsi pum,

rua qhov cov tuabneeg nuav lub sab ruag, puab tsi xaav noog, puab ntsaws qhovntsej, puab tsi xaav saib, puab qe muag. Yog tsi ua le ntawd, nyob tsaam puab qhovmuag yuav pum puab qhovntsej yuav nov, puab yuav totaub, ces puab yuav tig rov lug cuag kuv, hab kuv yuav khu puab tej mob zoo.’
“Tabsis mej yog cov kws muaj moo, mej qhovmuag txhaj pum hab mej qhovntsej txhaj nov.

Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, cov cev Vaajtswv lug hab cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tog ntev loo, xaav pum tej kws mej pum, tabsis puab tsi tau pum, puab xaav nov tej kws mej nov, tabsis puab tsi tau nov.
“Mej ca le noog, kuv yuav txhais zaaj lug pevtxwv kws has txug tug tseb nplej lub ntsab rua mej.

Cov tuabneeg kws nov zaaj lug kws has txug Ntuj Ceebtsheej tabsis tsi totaub, zoo ib yaam le lub noob nplej kws poob rua huv plawv kev. Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txawm lug txeeb tej lug ntawd huv puab lub sab lawm.
Cov noob nplej kws poob rua ntawm qhov aav kws huv muaj pobzeb tiv lawm, pev txug Vaajtswv txujlug kws thaus tuabneeg nov dlheev, puab txaus sab hlo txais yuav taamsim ntawd.
Tabsis txujlug ntawd cog tsi ruaj rua huv puab lub sab, txujlug ntawd nyob tsi ntev. Thaus puab raug kev txomnyem lossis kev tsimtxom, ces puab txawm muab tso tseg taamsim ntawd.

Cov noob nplej kws poob rua huv qaab tsob xuavpaug, pev txug Vaajtswv Txujlug kws tuabneeg nov; tabsis puab tej kev nyuaj sab, kev ntshaw nyaj hlub tuaj laum Vaajtswv txujlug lawm, puab txujkev ntseeg txhaj tsi luj hlub.

Hab cov noob nplej kws poob rua ntawm qhov aav zoo, pev txug Vaajtswv Txujlug kws tuabneeg nov, hab totaub: cov tuabneeg ntawd ibtxha txi tau ib puas lub, ibtxha txi tau rau caum lub, hab ibtxha txi tau peb caug lub.”
Yexus qha dlua ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab noog has tas: “Ntuj Ceebtsheej pev ib yaam le ib tug txivneej kws coj noob nplej moog tseb rua huv nwg dlaim teb.
Muaj ib mos thaus suavdlawg pw tsaug zug taag lawm, tug ntawd tug yeebncuab txawm coj cov noob txhauv tuaj tseb xyaw rua cov nplej, ces nwg txawm tsiv lawm.
Thaus cov nplej luj hlub hab pib txhawv lawm, ua cav pum muaj txhauv tuaj xyaw hab.
Tug tswv cov tubkhai lug has rua nwg tas, ‘Tug tswv, puas yog koj tsuas tseb cov noob nplej zoo rua huv koj dlaim teb xwb? Ua le caag nwgnuav tsua muaj txhauv tuaj xyaw hab?’
Nwg teb puab has tas, ‘Tej ntawd yog yeebncuab ua xwb.’ Cov tubkhai nug nwg has tas, ‘Koj puas xaav kuas peb moog muab cov txhauv ntawd dlob povtseg?’
Nwg teb has tas, ‘Tsi xob moog dlob, nyob tsaam thaus mej dlob cov txhauv, mej yuav dlob tau cov nplej hab.

Ca cov nplej hab cov txhauv nyob ua ke moog txug lub caij hlais tsaiv, kuv maam has kuas cov hlais xub hlais cov txhauv paav ua tej teg hab muab moog pov hlawv, hab sau cov nplej lug rua huv kuv lub txhaab.’ ”
Yexus has dlua ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab noog has tas: “Ntuj Ceebtsheej pev ib yaam le lub noob zaub. Muaj ib tug txivneej coj ib lub noob zaub moog cog rua huv nwg dlaim teb.

Lub noob zaub ntawd miv dlua lwm yaam noob huv tuabsi. Thaus lub noob ntawd tuaj lawm, nwg luj hlub ua ib tsob kws luj dlua tej zaub huv tuabsi. Nwg luj ua ib tsob ntoo hab noog lug ua zeg rua sau nwg tej ceg.”
Yexus has dlua ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua puab noog has tas: “Ntuj Ceebtsheej pev ib yaam le cov keeb kws ib tug quaspuj muab xyaw rua peb sab moov nplej, hab ua rua cov moov nplej su taag huv tuabsi.”
Tej zaaj kws Yexus qha rua suavdlawg, nwg ua lug pevtxwv qha xwb tsi muaj ib zaaj kws nwg tsi ua lug pevtxwv qha le.

Nwg ua le ntawd kuas muaj tav lawv le Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg has tas: “Thaus kuv has rua puab, kuv yuav ua lug pevtxwv has xwb. Kuv yuav qha tej kws tsi muaj tuabneeg paub, txij thaus tsim lub nplajteb lug rua puab noog.”

Yexus txawm tso cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd tseg hab nwg moog rua huv tsev. Nwg cov thwjtim lug has rua nwg tas, “Thov koj txhais zaaj lug pevtxwv kws koj has txug cov txhauv huv dlaim teb ntawd rua peb noog saib yog le caag.”
Yexus qha has tas, “Tug kws tseb cov noob nplej zoo yog Tuabneeg leej Tub;
dlaim teb yog lub nplajteb nuav; cov noob nplej kws zoo yog cov tuabneeg kws yog Vaajtswv cov; cov txhauv yog cov tuabneeg kws yog dlaab Ntxwgnyoog cov.
Hab tug yeebncuab kws tuaj tseb cov noob txhauv ntawd yog dlaab Ntxwgnyoog. Lub caij hlais yog lub sijhawm kws nplajteb kawg, cov hlais yog cov timtswv ceebtsheej.
Lub sijhawm nplajteb kawg yuav zoo ib yaam le thaus puab sau cov txhauv moog povtseg.
Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav khaiv nwg cov timtswv moog sau cov tuabneeg kws ua rua lwm tug ua txhum hab cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas huv tuabsi tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws
hab coj cov tuabneeg ntawd moog pov rua huv lub cubtawg kws cig hlub hlub, puab yuav quaj tum nav qawv qhov ntawd.
Thaus ntawd Vaajtswv cov tuabneeg yuav ci ntsaa ab ib yaam le lub nub nyob huv puab leej Txiv lub Tebchaws. Yog leejtwg muaj qhovntsej, ca le noog!

“Ntuj Ceebtsheej pev ib yaam le hub nyaj kws luas muab faus ca rua huv ib dlaim teb. Muaj ib tug moog pum ces nwg txawm muab aav npoog rua, nwg zoo sab kawg le. Nwg rov moog muab nwg lub cuabtaam muag huv tuabsi, hab muab cov nyaj moog yuav dlaim teb ntawd.
“Hab Ntuj Ceebtsheej pev ib yaam le ib tug tub luam moog nrhav yuav cov hlaws kws muaj nqes,
hab thaus nwg moog nrhav pum ib cov hlaws kws muaj nqes dlua tej huv tuabsi lawm, nwg txawm rov lug muab nwg lub cuabtaam muag hab muab cov nyaj moog yuav cov hlaws ntawd.
“Hab Ntuj Ceebtsheej pev ib yaam le lub vaag cuab ntseg kws luas muab cuab rua huv havtxwv maag tau txhua yaam ntseg.

Thaus lub vaag maag tau ntseg ntau heev lawm, cov tuabneeg cuab ntseg txawm nqug lub vaag lug rua tim ntug. Puab nyob quastsawg xaiv cov ntseg zoo ntim rua huv tawb, hab muab cov kws tsi muaj nqes povtseg.
Thaus lub sijhawm nplajteb kawg yuav zoo le ntawd ntaag. Cov timtswv yuav lug muab cov tuabneeg ua phem cais tawm ntawm cov tuabneeg ua zoo moog,
hab coj moog pov rua huv lub cubtawg kws cig hlub hlub, puab yuav quaj tum nav qawv qhov ntawd.”
Yexus nug cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej puas totaub tej nuav?” Puab teb has tas, “Peb totaub lawm.”

Ces Yexus txawm has rua puab tas, “Yog le ntawd, txhua tug xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai kws tub kawm paub txug Ntuj Ceebtsheej lawm, puab zoo ib yaam le tug tswv tsev kws muab nwg tej qhov txhua chaw qub hab tshab rhu tawm huv nwg lub txhaab lug siv.”
Thaus Yexus qha tej zaaj lug pevtxwv nuav taag lawm, nwg txawm tawm qhov ntawd

hab rov moog rua huv nwg lub nroog. Nwg moog qhuab qha huv lub tsev saablaaj, hab cov tuabneeg kws nov nwg qha xaav tsi thoob le. Puab sis thaam has tas, “Nwg tau tej tswvyim nuav qhov twg lug? Hab ua caag nwg ua tau tej txujci nuav?
Nwg puas yog tug kws ntoo tug tub? Nwg nam puas yog Malis? Hab nwg cov kwv puas yog Yakaunpaus, Yauxej, Ximoos hab Yudas?
Puas yog nwg cov muam puavleej nyob huv lub nroog nuav? Nwg tau tej tswvyim nuav qhov twg lug?”

Puab txawm tsi fwm Yexus. Yexus has rua puab tas, “Tej tuabneeg ob caag puavleej fwm tug cev Vaajtswv lug, tsuas yog cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv nwg lub zog hab nwg tsev tuabneeg txhaj tsi fwm nwg xwb.”
Yexus tsi tau ua tej txujci tseemceeb ntau pistsawg qhov ntawd, rua qhov puab tsi ntseeg.
Lub sijhawm ntawd, Helauj tug kws kaav lub xeev Kalilais nov txug Yexus lub moo.
Nwg txawm qha rua nwg cov numtswv has tas, “Tug nuav yeej yog Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug lawm, nwg txhaj ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb nuav.”
Rua qhov Helauj tau khaiv tuabneeg moog nteg Yauhaas khi hab coj nwg moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj. Helauj ua le ntawd tub yog Helauj yuav Helaudias kws yog nwg tug kwv Filis tug quaspuj.
Rua qhov Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej has rua Helauj has tas, “Qhov kws koj yuav Helaudias ua koj quaspuj txhum kevcai lawm!”
Helauj xaav tua Yauhaas, tabsis nwg ntshai cov Yudais, rua qhov suavdlawg paub tseeb has tas Yauhaas yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug.
Nub kws luas ncu txug Helauj nub yug, Helaudias tug ntxhais lug seev cev rua suavdlawg saib, Helauj txaus sab heev,
Helauj coglug rua tug ntxhais has tas, “Yog koj thov yaam twg, kuv yuav muab yaam ntawd rua koj!”

Tug ntxhais txawm moog thov Helauj lawv le nwg nam qha rua nwg lawm has tas, “Koj ca le muab Yauhaas tug kws muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej lub taubhau txav tso rua huv lub phaaj nqaa lug rua ntawm nuav!”
Vaajntxwv nyuaj sab kawg le, tabsis vim nwg tau coglug taabmeeg suavdlawg lawm, nwg txhaj ua lawv le tug ntxhais thov.
Ces nwg txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog txav Yauhaas cejdlaab huv tsev lojcuj.
Puab muab Yauhaas lub taubhau tso rua huv lub phaaj nqaa lug rua tug ntxhais, ces tug ntxhais nqaa moog rua nwg nam.
Yauhaas cov thwjtim txawm tuaj muab Yauhaas lub cev coj moog log lawm; hab puab moog qha tej nuav rua Yexus paub.

Thaus Yexus nov has tas Yauhaas tuag lawm, Yexus tuab leeg txawm caij nkoj tawm qhov ntawd moog rua ib qhov chaw kws tsi muaj tuabneeg. Thaus suavdlawg nov has tas Yexus moog rua qhov ntawd lawm, puab txawm tawm huv puab tej nroog taug ntug dlej caum Yexus qaab.
Thaus Yexus tawm huv nkoj lug, nwg pum muaj tuabneeg coob coob, nwg hlub puab hab nwg khu puab cov tuabneeg muaj mob txhua tug zoo huv tuabsi.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, Yexus cov thwjtim lug has rua Yexus has tas, “Qhov nuav nyob dleb nroog hab tub lig lig lawm, thov koj kuas suavdlawg moog nrhav yuav mov tom tej zog noj.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Tsi xob kuas puab moog, mej ca le muab mov rua puab noj!”
Cov thwjtim teb has tas, “Peb tsuas muaj tsib lub ncuav hab ob tug ntseg xwb.”
Yexus has tas, “Ca le muab lug rua kuv.”

Yexus kuas suavdlawg nyob quastsawg ntawm tej nyom; Yexus muab tsib lub ncuav hab ob tug ntseg lug, ces nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib rua sau ntuj, hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug hab muab cov ncuav ndlais cev rua cov thwjtim hab cov thwjtim coj moog faib rua suavdlawg noj.
Txhua tug puavleej tau noj tsau huv tuabsi. Cov thwjtim moog sau cov ncuav seem kws suavdlawg noj tsi taag tau kaum ob tawb puv nkaus.
Cov tuabneeg kws noj mov nub ntawd, cov txivneej muaj kwvlaam le tsib txheeb leej, tsi suav cov quaspuj hab mivnyuas.
Tom qaab ntawd Yexus kuas cov thwjtim nce moog rua huv nkoj hab caij hlaa havtxwv ua ntej moog rua saab tim u, ces Yexus txawm kuas suavdlawg rov moog tsev.
Tom qaab kws Yexus kuas puab moog tsev taag lawm, nwg tuab leeg nce moog thov Vaajtswv peg roob. Thaus tsaus ntuj lawm nwg tseem nyob nwg peg roob.
Lub sijhawm ntawd cov thwjtim tub caij lub nkoj moog txug ib nraab dlej lawm. Cua ntsawj tom hauv ntej tuaj ua rua dlej ndlaas tej nam twv tuaj ntaus lub nkoj.
Thaus plaub teev yuav kaaj ntug, Yexus lug kutaw sau nplaim dlej lug cuag cov thwjtim.
Thaus puab pum Yexus lug kutaw sau nplaim dlej, puab ntshai kawg le hab qw has tas, “Yog dlaab!”
Taamsim ntawd Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej tsi xob poob sab! Yog kuv ntaag, tsi xob ntshai!”
Petus has tas, “Tug Tswv, yog has tas yog koj tag, thov koj has kuas kuv moog tau sau nplaim dlej tuaj cuag koj.”
Yexus teb has tas, “Ca le tuaj!” Petus txawm tawm huv lub nkoj moog kutaw sau nplaim dlej moog cuag Yexus.
Tabsis thaus Petus pum cua ntsawj hlub hlub nwg ntshai kawg le, ces nwg txawm tog zog rua huv dlej. Nwg hu nrov nrov has tas, “Tug Tswv, thov koj paab kuv!”
Taamsim ntawd Yexus txawm cev loo teg moog tuav nkaus Petus hab has tas, “Ua le caag koj kev ntseeg yuav tsawg ua luaj le! Ua le caag koj tsi ca sab?”
Thaus obtug nce moog rua huv lub nkoj, ces cua txawm tu lawm.
Cov thwjtim kws nyob huv lub nkoj txawm txhus caug ndlua hawm Yexus hab has tas, “Koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub tag.”
Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim caij nkoj hlaa havtxwv moog txug tim Nkenexales.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob cheebtsaam ntawd paub has tas yog Yexus. Puab txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog qha rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig cheebtsaam ntawd. Ces puab txawm coj tej tuabneeg muaj mob tuaj cuag Yexus.
Puab thov Yexus has tas, ca puab kov Yexus lub tw tsho xwb; hab puab txhua tug kws tau kov puavleej zoo huv tuabsi.
Tom qaab ntawd muaj cov Falixais hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai tuaj nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj cuag Yexus hab nug has tas,
“Ua le caag koj cov thwjtim tsi ua lawv le tej kevcai kws peb cov yawmkoob ibtxwm qha rua peb? Koj cov thwjtim tsi xub ntxuav teg lawv le kevcai tsaiv maam le noj mov!”
Yexus teb has tas, “Ua le caag mej ua lawv le tej kevcai, tabsis mej tsi ua lawv le Vaajtswv Txujlug qha?
Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Koj yuavtsum fwm koj nam koj txiv,’ hab has tas, ‘Yog leejtwg tshev nwg nam nwg txiv, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.’
Tabsis mej qha has tas yog leejtwg muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi kws yuav paab tau nwg nam nwg txiv, tabsis nwg has tas, ‘Kuv tub muab rua Vaajtswv lawm,’
tsi taag tug ntawd yuav fwm nwg nam nwg txiv  lawm. Qhov kws mej ua le mej tej kevcai nuav, yog mej ua saib tsi taug Vaajtswv txujlug.
Cov tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus! Qhov kws Yaxayas tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug tau has txug mej yeej muaj tseeb tag:
Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Cov tuabneeg nuav lub qhovncauj fwm kuv tabsis puab lub sab tsi npuab kuv.
Qhov kws puab pehawm kuv tsi muaj nqes le, rua qhov puab muab tuabneeg tej kevcai lug qha ib yaam le tej kevcai ntawd yog kuv tej kevcai!’ ”
Yexus hu cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd lug cuag nwg, hab nwg has rua puab has tas, “Mej ua tuab zoo noog kuv has, mej txhaj totaub!
Tsi yog yaam kws moog rua huv tuabneeg lub qhovncauj, ua rua tuabneeg ua txhum, tabsis yog tej kws tawm huv tuabneeg lub qhovncauj lug, txhaj ua rua tuabneeg ua txhum xwb.”
Thaus ntawd cov thwjtim lug has rua Yexus has tas, “Koj tsi paub has tas tej lug kws koj has ntawd ua rua cov Falixais chim kawg le los?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Txhua tsob ntoo kws tsi yog kuv Txiv tug kws nyob sau ntuj cog, yuav muab rhu huv tuabsi povtseg.”
“Puamchawj puab! Puab yog cov thawjcoj kws coj cov dligmuag; yog ib tug dligmuag coj ib tug dligmuag kev, ces obtug yeej yuav poob qhov xwb.”
Petus has tas, “Thov koj txhais zaaj lug pevtxwv nuav rua peb.”
Yexus teb cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej tseem tsi totaub le hab los?
Mej tsi paub has tas, yaam kws moog ntawm tuabneeg lub qhovncauj, yaam ntawd moog rua huv tuabneeg lub plaab, hab tawm dlhau lawm xwb.
Tabsis tej lug kws tuabneeg lub qhovncauj has, yog tawm huv tuabneeg lub sab lug, tej lug ntawd ua rua tuabneeg ua txhum.
Rua qhov yaam kws tawm huv tuabneeg lub sab lug, ua rua tuabneeg tua tuabneeg, ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg, ua kev nkauj kev nraug, ua tubsaab, has lug dlaag, hab rhuav lwm tug ntsejmuag.
Tej nuav yog tej kws ua rua tuabneeg ua txhum, tabsis qhov kws tsi ntxuav teg maam le noj mov, yeej tsi ua rua tuabneeg ua txhum.”
Yexus tawm qhov ntawd moog rua peg cheebtsaam kws ze lub nroog Tiles hab lub nroog Xidoos.
Muaj ib tug quaspuj kws yog tuabneeg Kana-aas nyob huv cheebtsaam ntawd tuaj cuag Yexus hab thov has tas, “Daviv tug Tub, thov koj hlub kuv! Kuv tug ntxhais raug dlaab, ua rua nwg txomnyem kawg le.”
Tabsis Yexus tsi teb tug quaspuj ntawd ib lus le. Yexus cov thwjtim lug cuag Yexus hab has tas, “Koj kuas nwg tsiv moog! Rua qhov nwg pheej lawv peb qaab hab quaj thov le ntawd!”
Yexus teb has tas, “Vaajtswv tsuas khaiv kuv lug nrhav cov Yixalayees kws yog paab yaaj kws pluj lawm xwb.”
Thaus tug quaspuj nov le ntawd, nwg txawm lug txhus caug ndlua ntawm Yexus kutaw hab thov has tas, “Tug Tswv, thov koj paab kuv.”
